秋季天光正好🌞趁著好天氣，今天下午貓貓跟Mr.櫻到薩爾斯堡附近的森林湖區散步。樹葉漸漸變色中，明顯地感受到季節正在變換中💖安靜而與世無爭的環境讓我們好嚮往！

 So far in October we have nice weather in Salzburg! This afternoon Mr. Sakura
and I went to Anthering forest and lake to have a short walk. We really like
this quiet place, it's very peaceful. Hopefully someday its owner will
understand that too! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #Anthering

[02. Jul. 2018 貓貓的廚房日記 Kat's kitchen diary]

 
貓兒種的藍紫色琉璃苣開花了，比指甲片還小的種籽漸漸長成一叢花束好有成就感啊。五朵花瓣排成小星星的形狀，把他加到豆花裡瞬間很浪漫！它是食用的花卉，拿來陪襯沙拉，或是其他擺盤也好美哩
❤️

 My borage is flowering beautifully! It has purple blossoms, which are star-like
and very lovely! I decorated the tofu pudding with these flowers, so the dish
immediately looks more attractive and delicious! Kai-dong! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

嗚嗚嗚🤣貓兒有選擇障礙了...實在不知該怎麼挑選照片寫聖家堂日記。短居在La Sagrada
Família聖家堂附近，天天經過這個大古蹟，不管什麼樣的天氣教堂怎麼看都好美：早晨、傍晚、夜裡、晴天、多雲。經典又壯觀的聖家堂在不同天色中都是獨一無二的⛪️
通通喜歡啊😻😻😻！

 從外觀聖家堂分成三個不同的面：東(誕生立面)、西(受難立面)、南面(榮耀立面...還在蓋)。每個面各有四座塔，3x4=12座塔，代表耶穌的12門徒。
教堂中央還有另外6座塔象徵聖經4福音(瑪竇、馬爾谷、路加、若望)＋聖瑪莉亞＋耶穌(還在蓋)...正座教堂以聖經的故事蓋成。做工細緻、處處充滿巧思❤️太震撼了！

 The La Sagrada Família church is so glorious and brilliant! It’s very difficult
for me to select the best photo from my folder. No matter if sunrise, sunset,
rainy, sunny, day or night, this church is so beautiful in all situations. #西班牙 
#巴賽隆納 #加泰隆尼亞 #伊比利亞半島 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Spain #Barcelona #Catalonia 
#IberianPeninsula #trip #KaidongWithKat

想念從小愛吃的家鄉甜點時，貓兒就去超市買歐洲嫩豆腐(silken
tofu絲豆腐)加上自己熬波霸、洗愛玉、煮仙草凍。唯有美中不足的是白珍珠煮了兩小時以上都不變透明，它看來就是不想跟我熟啊😂
！把所有配料通通湊起來貓兒的小小冰果室又開張啦！想吃什麼自己加，自助餐點心，吃飽吃滿唷😋👍夏季限定！

 Whenever I miss Taiwanese desserts, I go to a local supermarket to buy European
silken tofu. Then I cook some black and white sugar pearls alongside aiyu and
grass jelly. Combining these ingredients together with honey water, this mixture
turns into a very delicious Taiwanese-style summer dessert! Oh, I can't wait to
eat it! Yummy! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #cooking

10月中，又到了貓兒與Mr.櫻的結婚紀念日。我們到瑪特湖散步，回味當時婚宴聚餐的地方。時光匆匆❤️決定一起生活就互相攜手珍惜囉！

 A few days ago, Mr. Sakura and I celebrated our wedding anniversary. We had a
afternoon walk around Mattsee lake and enjoyed a coffee break. I really like
this small town, it's so quiet and peacefully! #生活日記 #開動with貓 #薩爾斯堡 #瑪特湖 
#Mattsee #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #SchlossMattsee

一年一度薩爾堡的『聖.羅伯特 - 教會慶典 St. Rupert's Day Fair 』又到囉！今年從9月20日至24日(早上10點到晚上11點)總共五天。
.
此活動集合「狂歡市集與啤酒節的排場」有遊樂設施，小遊戲，美食攤販，是個很適合攜家帶眷參加的慶典！在亞洲相似的活動稱為廟會，因為奧地利是天主教國家，把廟會(德文Kirtag)翻譯成教會慶典。
.
在這為期5日的活動裡從早到晚市中心都有節目，例如：奧地傳統舞蹈💃歌唱表演🎤煙火🎆...等等。今年貓兒仍是老樣子，下班後跟同事朋友們過去續攤吃吃喝喝🍗🍺
9月20日至24日有經過薩爾堡的朋友們不妨到市區沾點宗教慶典的喜氣吧〜跟著吃喝玩樂🐱開動！
.
Salzburg's annual "St. Rupert's Day Fair" starts again soon! This year it will
run from September 20-24 (10am-11pm), for five days.
.
St. Rupert's Day Fair is kind of carnival mixed with a beer garden fest! During
the fair, Salzburg city center will have many activities, such as traditional
Austrian dancing, singing performances, fireworks, etc.
.
I think this year I will go again alongside my friends and colleagues after
work. If you are in Salzburg at this time, we recommend you checking out this
event! It's will be a nice experience! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria 
#Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

無論是什麼宗教，它都是讓人寄託心靈的地方。佛教、道教、天主教、基督教、伊斯蘭教、東正教...心誠則靈！每次當未來感到很不確定的時候我們總會去薩爾斯堡郊外瑪莉亞平原上的教堂
⛪️🕯️點蠟燭祈禱。
.
台灣慶生這日貓兒同時有個很重要的會議，與接下來的人生規劃＆職涯方向緊密相連，請貓友們共同集氣💪
盼望順遂。雙十節慶，更願世界各地熱愛自由並且努力維護人權的朋友們一切平安！阿們אמן🙏。
.
No matter if you are a believer of religions, such as Buddhism, Christianity,
Judaism, Hinduism or Islam, or not - they are an important factor in giving
people mental support! Whenever phases in life feel undecided, or we require
quiet time to contemplate, our family tends to visit a church near Salzburg,
which is located on a hill, called Maria Plain. This place radiates a calm and
clear atmosphere, which is much appreciated, because soon I will have an
important meeting. Hopefully, everything will be fine. Amen. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #瑪莉亞平原

入秋清晨煙雨濛濛的國王湖好閑逸🍁☔️
滴滴答答的細雨打在片片轉黃的樹葉上，空氣是冰涼涼的，山嵐圍繞著群峰。實在好喜歡如此詩情畫意的湖畔清晨！PS:早上10點前安靜又美麗，連停車位都不用愁。

 Königssee in the early morning is very quiet! The air is still cold, taking
this special moment to listen to the rain dropping on the lake surface and the
yellow leaves of the surrounding trees. We very much enjoyed this atmosphere.

[14. Aug. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 
貓媽、貓舅八月份來奧地利找我們，這幾日貓兒開著小哺哺車與他們重遊哈施塔特Hallstatt小鎮。景物沒變...變得是停車位極為難找！超超超超極多訪客，從前安靜的小鎮轉眼幾年間遊人如織。唯一欣慰的是黏人的貓咪
😺一樣熱情黏人(奉勸想去的朋友們跳過夏季與週末時間)！

 Hallstatt is a very beautiful small Austrian village, but in the summer there
are way too many visitors. If you ask me which season I would recommend for a
visit, I'd say autumn and winter is the best time to have a more peaceful
atmosphere! But no matter which season, the cats there are always very cute! 
#奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #哈施塔特 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat 
#Hallstatt

六月底七月初，又到藍莓成熟的季節❤️
這次貓兒帶著朋友一起去體驗『採新鮮藍莓』。阿爾卑斯山脈的支脈Untersberg山腳下整片果園好遼闊！園內試吃完全免費，只有帶走藍莓的必須秤重。先努力『品嚐』吧
😛😋裝在肚子裡的通通是你的～嘿嘿！

 In Salzburg, the blueberry farms open at the end of June. So, this afternoon we
decided to go and pick some berries. 😉 They let you eat for free, and you only
need to pay for what gets taken home, which is a very friendly rule. Therefore,
customers enjoy picking berries on their farm. They are so tasty and fresh! #奧地利 
 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

中秋節夜裡的月光皎潔明亮，Mr.櫻跟貓兒在薩爾斯河畔散步，感受夜裡的寧靜。唯一跟亞洲不同的是沒有萬家烤肉萬家香😆㊗️
貓友們：花好月圓人團圓＆千里共嬋娟，中秋快樂＆週末愉快！

 Tonight Mr. Sakura and I went for a short stroll along the Salzach river to see
the beautiful full moon! The moonlight was very clear, and stronger than the
street lamps. On such a romantic night, we wish you all a wonderful time. Happy
Mid-Autumn Festival! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #cooking

貓兒把森林裡揀到的栗子通通都烤了🌰🍂每年到秋季總是要吃幾次才有過秋的感覺呢！做法非常簡單(跟同事學來的)：1.泡冷水50分鐘，皮軟後在栗子上切十字痕
2.糖水煮15分鐘半熟(可不用糖水) 3.烤箱烤20分鐘170-180°C(下方放一盆水保持栗子濕潤) 4.完成咧😺😽這就來吃甜滋滋的秋季森林鮮味囉～開動！

 Eating roasted chestnuts is a kind of ceremony for us to welcome the fall. Here
is a simple recipe from a colleague, which makes the chestnut shell easy to
remove: 1. Place chestnuts into cold water for 50 minutes. When the shell is
getting soft, cut a X into the chestnut shell. 2. Use sugar water to boil them
for 15 minutes until they are medium. 3. Place an extra water-bath into an oven
to increase the moisture. Roast the chestnuts for 20 minutes at 170-180°C.
That's all! Please enjoy the delicious chestnuts! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 
#薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

這幾天的臉書都被綠豆椪＆蛋黃酥＆月餅刷版😂
貓兒為了防止口水流不止，也跟上大家的進度來包蛋黃酥。感謝網路上好多很棒的食譜，比較幾篇步驟詳盡的食譜後找出自己喜歡的方式。目前先做8顆蛋黃酥，有的是蛋黃，有的包栗子。

 很幸運，貓兒第一次嘗試烤的蛋黃酥非常成功❤️Mr.櫻＆公公婆婆都好愛這個口味！甚至櫻先生指定下次他要完全紅豆餡😊沒想到他愛上紅豆泥了😋開動囉㊗️
貓友們：中秋快樂，闔家平安健康！

 This Friday is Mid-Autumn Moon Festival in Asia. Recently, I saw many friends
on Facebook making different kind of moon cakes to celebrate this festival.
Therefore, I decided to join in, and made 8 pieces of little moon egg yolk
pastry. The filling consists of chestnuts with red bean paste, with shortcrust
pastry on the outside.

 Since it was the first time baking this type of cakes, I was very suprised by
the good results, and Sakura family liked them very much! Next time I will make
even more of this tasty style of moon pastries. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

歐洲越來越多『不中不西』或是說『又中又西 fusion
food』的餐廳正在成立！這間餐館就是最好的例子：老闆是奧地利人，他學到做饅頭的方法，又把饅頭弄的像刈包(但不是真正的刈包)，餡料加上東方的食材做成像“漢堡”
😉這樣的亞洲漢堡＆薯條放在迷你蒸籠裡，如此在歐洲人的經營下反而是高朋滿座呢！貓兒也去捧場了😋好吃！難怪客人這麼多。
.
餐廳裡其他菜餚，不知是走日式? 中式? 還是越南料理? 把亞洲食材拼拼揍揍，歐洲人好愛這一套，再晚點去餐廳就爆滿了，要排隊囉！

 Europe has more and more fusion cuisine! Such as this restaurant, it uses Asian
steamed bread and ingredients to make a different style of hamburgers. It looks
a bit unusual but it is getting very popular.

 We were so lucky that we arrived a bit early, therefore they still had free
seats and there was no need for reservation. After 6 pm, the restaurant became
occupied by guests and there was no more places to sit down. Lucky us! #奧地利 
#茵斯布魯克 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Innsbruck #KaidongWithKat #trip

[30. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 好喜歡維也納的街景，在路上走著走著很容易就遇到歷史悠久的可愛古董車呢！市中心的建築非常有味道，優雅的雕花需要龐大的手工與人力😺前人建築技術完全不輸現在哩！

 This antique car in the old city makes me feel going back in time! Speaking of
old life style, in Vienna city central you can see so many beautiful Baroque
architecture and classical design! It's so enjoyable! #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna

秋天到了！氣溫漸漸轉涼，這個時候最適合去泡湯＆水療SPA。奧地利，因斯布魯克城市Innsbruck附近的Obermieming上明敏小鎮有間很知名的『五星⭐
阿爾卑斯山脈水療養生會館Alpenresort Schwarz』貓兒對它的服務與設備非常滿意👍
室內＆外總共9個不同的泳池，水溫風景都不一樣。加上各式主題的乾＆濕Sauna蒸汽浴，點心飲料免費暢飲，風景佳氣氛寧靜，可以得到完全的放鬆，好喜歡它的環境，望著阿爾卑斯山脈享受泡湯與放空！工作人員服務體貼又親切
💖😺

 Autumn is arriving, it's getting colder and colder. In this season visiting a
thermal spring is a very good idea! Near Innsbruck, in Obermieming town there is
a five star thermal bath, Alpenresort Schwarz. It has a lot of indoor and
outdoor pools and many different saunas and spas. I really liked their service
and atmosphere, we had a nice time in this wonderful place! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#提洛爾省 #阿爾卑斯山脈溫泉會館 #Tirol #Austria #Obermieming #KaidongWithKat 
#AlpenresortSchwarz

[22. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 踏入這間小店😲
讓貓兒以為到了日本，完全不像在奧地利啊！從擺飾到餐點完全和風！只有前台店員是可愛的奧地利女孩，大廚二廚全是日本人。他們烹調的食物好道地，完全合胃口！謝謝貓小妹請客&帶路
🙏🙏🙏多謝款待ごちそうさま❤️馬上列入口袋名單，下次去維也納玩耍還要再訪，開心吃吃喝喝~這就是人生嘛！

 This restaurant will make you forget that you are in Vienna! All the bowls and
cups on the wall are traditional Japanese style. Their food is very tasty, and I
liked it so much! Thanks a lot to my sister, because she invited me to this nice
place! #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #日本料理 #Austria #KaidongWithKat #Wien 
#Vienna #MarisMetchaMatcha #WasyokuCafeRestaurant #JapaneseFood

從斗篷橋旁邊的空地俯瞰捷克『庫倫洛夫』小鎮，此景在眼前貓兒忍不住許願希望能夠把時間暫停在這一瞬間！無論下雪&融雪、各有各的美。我們剛到的日子飄著輕雪，四周屋頂白皚皚！隔日太陽出來積雪漸漸融化，磚紅色屋頂更顯濃濃的歷史感。冬季裡景色確實美不勝收哪
😍！

 Krumlov city center is small but very beautiful. No matter if it's snowy or
sunny! These photos were taken from a terrace near Cloak Bridge on two different
days. I can't believe that even though I just used my mobile phone to take the
pictures, they turned out so nice! Happy!#捷克 #庫倫洛夫 #旅遊日記 #開動with貓 #CzechRepublic 
 #Krumlov #trip #KaidongWithKat

[30. Sep. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 難得的機會到奧地利的提洛爾省Tirol、上明敏Obermieming小鄉鎮拜訪朋友🐎
我們住在馬場附近早晚都聽見馬廄裡的聲音。四周是阿爾卑斯山群環繞著，農村裡常常會遇見正在務農的車輛來往，小村莊裡的居民熱情親切，就算不認識也會主動與我們打招呼！這種感覺真好，讓我想起在台灣貓外婆家的村子也是這樣，街訪鄰居都好有人情味啊
❤️

 We went to Obermieming town in Tirol to visit a friend. Near our hotel was a
big horse barn that had more than 15 horses. It's the first time for us living
near so many horses, so we were very curious and observed them often. We had a
lot of fun experiencing country life, and met many friendly people in this small
town. #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #提洛爾省 #Tirol #Austria #Obermieming 
#KaidongWithKat

這個禮拜超級熱，歐洲進入逼近36-40度的高溫！這種大熱天裡植物長得真好🌹🌺🌼🌻小苑花兒齊放。一家人趁著晴天在院子裡烤肉＆賞花😸🍰
櫻媽媽烤的蛋糕真好吃！這種熱天裡反而會想念下雨的日子啊。

 It's getting hotter and hotter in Europe, and on such days people enjoy to
grill in their gardens. This is this year's first summer BBQ party in Sakura
family's garden. Sakura mama also made a delicious cheese cake! It was tasty,
cool and perfect for a hot summer day! Yummy! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #小苑日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #gardening

西班牙著名的『田橋仔之屋 - Casa Milà米拉之家』是貓兒非常有興趣的景點。一直很想去探訪20世紀初富裕人家的生活品味。話說Pere
Milà(佩雷·米拉)先生很會經商而且喜愛藝術，所以請了Gaudí高第建築師(設計聖家堂的那位)來幫他的屋子畫設計圖。米拉先生想住在走在時代尖端的藝術品內，所以這個大型華麗公寓的評價很兩極。那個年代有人說這個建築是創新＆獨秀
👍也有人說奇形怪狀，很醜👎。大家品味不同，米拉先生自己開心最重要！

 
高第除了重視採光，這棟屋子裡的細微處靈感出於大自然，特別是海底生物的造型：海藻、海葵、波浪。不得不佩服高第的天賦與用心，他設計出來的建築作品特別有靈魂！在這個老屋子裡走完一趟，只能說...非常佩服高第的思維！無論哪件他的建築作品都充滿著對大自然的熱愛，與對生命濃濃的熱情。
🐱貓兒自己的想法是👉
如果高第能再多注重一點風水會更好(來不及，已經蓋完了)...畢竟人因宅而立，宅因人而存，氣場＆磁場與房屋結構很重要。去掉造型不論(穿堂煞、門沖煞、回風煞、房無方正之間)，至少高第有個優點是很注重採光！
 

 Casa Milà is a very modern apartment house in Barcelona. It was designed by
Gaudí, and belonged to a rich businessman named Pere Milà. That‘s why the
building is called Casa Milà (Milà‘s home). However, it’s also known as La
Pedrera (The stone quarry). One of the most special elements of the building is
the roof, which is covered with skylights, stair exits, fans, as well as the
chimneys, famously called „witch scarers“ (see photos). In this big building you
can see many beautiful rooms with elegant furniture from the twentieth century.
If you are a Gaudí fan, I would recommend you to visit this modern architecture!

今年薩爾堡的『聖.羅伯特 -
教會慶典』落幕了！活動最後一晚，同事們相邀在市區逛小攤販＆看慶典的閉幕煙火。市集是越夜越熱鬧啊！我們在小攤販點了熱狗堡、小酌啤酒，又吃了『炸老鼠』這是奧地利很傳統的甜點。做法其實很簡單，把一丸麵團放在油裡炸，完成後撒上糖霜！因為造型小小圓圓的如同小老鼠，所以被稱做『炸老鼠Gebackene
Mäuse』第一次聽到的時候還以為真的有隻老鼠包在麵團裡🐭😨太可怕啦。整個活動在大家看完美麗的煙火告尾聲❤️明年再見囉！

 Time passes so quickly! St. Rupert's Day Fair is already over, but I had a

九月中的山林裡有絲絲的秋天氣息，空氣變涼，樹葉開始逐漸轉色。今天Mr.櫻與貓兒開車到德國邊境藍紹教堂旁的『洇溪峽谷

.
洇溪峽谷不長，約200公尺算小型峽谷！賞景加拍照約30-40分鐘可以逛完。若有興趣能繼續接著山路能夠走到藍紹辛特湖Hintersee(約2小時路程)。它很幽靜，大晴天的週末人潮稍微多些但不擁擠。我們雖居住在市區裡但總嚮往山林湖畔生活

.
When the weather is nice on the weekend, we like to go outdoors and experience
different natural sceneries. This time we visited Wimbachklamm gorge, which is
near the parish church of St. Sebastian in Ramsau, Berchtesgaden.

網路無國界，在世界各地處處都有行動力超強的貓友們，不遠千里來相見！貓兒窩在家裡用鍵盤與照片紀錄著吃喝玩樂日記而認識這麼多親切的朋友～好高興有這樣的緣分，感恩🙏
謝謝！
.
Oh... Monday is back! So we have to get ready for work again, which is
especially hard after a nice weekend. On Saturday Mr. Sakura and I visited
Mattsee, and on Sunday four friends and I went to beautiful Bluntausee, which is
famous for its emerald green coloured lake. 
.
This time we arrived early and there was a thin white fog over the lake surface.
Later, when the sun came out, the fog was gone and the water colour became even
shinier. I'm very happy to have such nice chance to meet this four friends! So
nice to see you in Salzburg! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #伯倫陶湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #Bluntauseen

氣溫越來越低，瓦勒湖Wallersee深秋的景色被遍地的落葉填滿！湖水冰冷，與夏季的熱鬧反差很大。夏天游泳釣魚的人到處都是，準備入冬了整個湖畔只有Mr.櫻跟貓貓在散步，偶爾才遇到迎面而來的行人。安安靜靜的享受這片淨土更是令一番意境！感謝薩爾斯堡附近許多美麗的湖
🙏只要天氣好抓著空閒就散步去，秋季之美總是稍縱即逝。

 It's getting colder, therefore less people are visiting the Wallersee lake. We
are very glad about this situation, because it is more quiet than in summer.
This time Mr. Sakura and I had a long walk around the lake. I'm very happy that
there are many beautiful lakes in Salzburg countryside, we are going to visit
them one after another when we have the time! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #瓦勒湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #Wallersee #KaidongWithKat

[18. Aug. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary] 😺啟動度假模式😺

 
親愛的貓友們，貓版暫時休息兩個禮拜！這期間由於貓媽皇太后來訪，我乖乖跟老闆請假數日，貓兒充當母后的司機開著小哺哺陪她自駕闖蕩德奧旅行。我們九月初再見，到時候再來FB仔細紀錄沿途的風景。祝大家暑期愉快，專心工作＆努力玩耍！天氣熱大家記得補充水份唷，九月見
😽😽😽 PS:照片攝於奧地利高薩湖Gosauseen(前幾日子與貓媽、貓舅在那邊野餐＆放空)。

 Dear Kat blog friends, this year we are going on a summer vacation! Therefore
there won't be any new updates until September begins. Thank you very much for
your understanding! We will come back soon and share our trip diary with you.
See you soon! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #高薩湖 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #Gosausee

唷~好香唷!!! 跟隨著嗅覺走入小巷子裡。原來慕尼黑當地朋友介紹好吃的德式烤豬腳就在這裡💖難怪從巷子頭馬上聞到讓人飢餓感快速上升的香噴噴🍖烤肉味！

 帶著貓媽去體驗大口吃肉的海派飲食！不過生菜沙拉也不能少，對貓貓而言如果生活裡少了蔬菜會很痛苦🤣
來、來、來～乾杯。敬：大口吃肉、大口喝酒的日子。祝大家健康快樂過每一天！

 Ah! It smells so good! I followed the aroma and found the Schweinshaxe
restaurant that my local friends suggested to me! It is Kat's mum first time
trying German-style Schweinshaxe. We not only ordered the meat, but also a big
bowl of salad. So let's enjoy the meal together and stay happy and healthy
everyday! #德國 #慕尼黑 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #遊記 #Germany #Munich #KaidongWithKat 
#trip #Schweinshaxe

好美的西班牙建築啊😺從外觀很容易誤以為它是教堂，錯錯錯！它是14-19世紀的知名『聖十字 聖保羅醫院』 🏥 
鼎鼎大名的聖家堂建築師高第就是在這座醫院裡辭世的。

 現在這座經典的老醫院已經被聯合國編列為『世界文化遺產』如今它變成提供人們參觀的文化博物館。貓貓好開心有這個機會一覽它的古典風華！醫院的歷史故事寫在各張照片裡。

 『The Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau』was established in 1401 as „Hospital
of the Holy Cross“. In late nineteenth century the Catalan banker Pau Gil
donated his heritage to the hospital to rebuild parts of it and construct many
new buildings. Therefore, it was renamed to『Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant
Pau』to commemorate Mr. Pau Gil. 

 In 1926 the famous architect Antoni Gaudí was sent to this hospital because of
a car accident, and later died after suffering severe injuries. This hospital is
full of historical stories and beautiful architectures. If you are planning a
trip to Barcelona, I would strongly recommend you to visit this place! #聖十字聖保羅醫院 
 #西班牙 #巴賽隆納 #加泰隆尼亞 #伊比利亞半島 #旅行日記 #開動with貓 #Spain #Barcelona #Catalonia 
#HospitaldelaSantaCreuiSantPau #SantPauHospital #KaidongWithKat

[26. Jun. 2018 櫻貓家小苑日記 Sakura family's garden diary]

 仲夏以來百合開得非常好！沙拉、碗豆、香菜們陸續收成❤️新來的鄰居藏身在樹籬笆叢之間，小鳥寶寶剛長毛不久，常常看到勤勞的鳥兒爸媽在餵食呢！好溫馨的四寶家庭🐦
🐦🐦🐦

 Lilies are fully blooming in midsummer, and I like their orange colour.
Recently, our garden got some new neighbors, whom are lovely baby birds! Mama
bird is always busy with feeding her babies. We really enjoy observing them
growing up, and wish them a happy time in our garden! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

這是個陰天的日子，空氣裡的水份有些重！去郊外湖畔，本來只想順著小路隨意走走，一邊探險一邊聊天Mr.櫻跟貓兒不知不覺中就把不大也不小的湖畔小徑繞完(薩爾斯堡州、法斯特瑙小鎮Faistenau的辛特湖畔Hintersee)。真正回到家太陽已經下山了！湖畔的老木屋讓我駐足，想起格林童話裡小矮人們在森林中的房子
😉

 We went to a lake near Faistenau, which is called Hintersee. The lake is not
very big and a round trip takes 1 hour to complete.The most impressing thing is
that there are lots of beautiful driftwoods. We saw many people picking them up,
maybe for decoration. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #法斯特瑙 #辛特湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#Faistenau #Hintersee #KaidongWithKat

『庫倫洛夫』是捷克被聯合國已列入世界文化遺產的迷人可愛小鎮！古老的建築就像住在童話村裡面。我們在這個小鎮裡小居了四天三夜，旅館乾淨舒服，每天有人打掃，費用兩人竟然這些天加起來150歐有找，而且附早餐＆停車免費！真的是太划算了哩
🤗房間附設靠著河岸的觀景陽台，很高興旅行前做了許多功課＆到處查旅館互相比價！實在物超所值❤️

 這次的旅程中發現貓老爸真好養，只要吃好、睡好、住好、他就一切心滿意足了。瞧，貓爸大悅也～開心！

 Krumlov is a designated UNESCO World Heritage site since 1992. The name of this
town is derived from the meaning "crooked meadow". It sounds really cute, and
this fairy tale small town is indeed so lovely. We were living there for four
days and enjoyed the various weather stuations such as sunny, rainy, snowy and
windy. Very nice memories! #捷克 #庫倫洛夫 #旅遊日記 #開動with貓 #CzechRepublic #Krumlov 
#trip #KaidongWithKat

春有百花秋有月，夏有涼風冬有雪； 若無閒事掛心頭，便是人間好時節。(引用 - 宋朝．無門慧開 禪師)

 
貓兒一直嚮往與追求沒有掛礙＆放下與人比較的日子！這幾個禮拜以來大學時期老朋友來訪，只要空閑之餘就帶她一起『投奔自然』離開市區到郊外看風景(照片：薩爾斯堡Mattsee馬特湖)。以前的我們努力在奧地利求學，她畢業後找到很適合的工作而離開這塊土地，貓兒因緣際會下繼續留在這片土地生活。匆匆一別就是10多年有餘。

 
人生有幾個10年呢？只要能夠健康的活著，做自己喜愛的事情，有緣分重逢是很感激的！保持著心定＆靈靜，人生僅就是一場對人事物的經歷與體會。放下俗世罣礙，任何一刻都是人間好時節
❤️🤗為能再相見＆彼此的健康平安快樂！

 I'm so glad to meet my good old friend again in Salzburg. We got to know each
other in our student time at university. After graduation, she got a nice job
and went back to her country. I really miss our time together.

 This summer she visited Austria, so our good old time came back again. I took
her to Mattsee to enjoy the nice weather and the scenery. Then we ordered ice
coffee, as we always did.

 I'm very happy that we are both in good health, and can do what we like! Cheers
to our friendship! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #瑪特湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #Mattsee

八月中旬，奧地利最近開始漸漸轉涼。努力抓住夏天的尾巴❤️去了一趟Fuschlsee富施爾湖玩『立式槳板Stand Up Paddle
(SUP)』滑向湖心看風景...這樣單獨划槳是貓兒的首次嘗試，其實不難馬上就上手。浮板上能站也能坐🚣累了就躺下隨水波漂浮，是個難得又有趣的經驗。
.
回到岸上後再來個野餐😻夏天裡大家用不同的方式投入大自然的懷抱，無論如何除了開心好玩，最重要是注意安全囉！
.
My friend and I went to Fuschlsee for Stand Up Paddle (SUP). It was my very fist
time trying this activity. SUP is not difficult, you can stand up or sit down on
the surfboard, or even just lay down and enjoy the warm weather.

 After paddling, we went back to have a cozy picnic near the beautiful lake in
the late afternoon. I had a very relaxing time on the lake, and definitely
recommend you to give SUP a try. However, please don't forget about your safety! 
#奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

捷克『庫倫洛夫』小鎮處處是美景，好多照片貓兒一直沒有時間整理，無論夜裡或白天各有它迷人之處。難得跟貓爸在雪夜裡的小鎮散步，回想起來我們父女晚上出門走走的光景，上一次是小學時候的回憶了！把握當下與家人相聚的機會，時光匆匆啊。

 Krumlov is a very lovely town in Czech Republic. I took many photos there, but
until now I didn't have the time to sort out all the pictures. Here are some
beautiful snow photos taken both at day and night. If you want to visit this
place, I would recommend you to at least stay for two days to check the
wonderful night view. #捷克 #庫倫洛夫 #開動with貓 #CzechRepublic #Krumlov #trip 
#KaidongWithKat

[03. Sep. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary] 

 感謝平安回到家了🙏
這趟貓貓獨自開車與貓媽勇闖歐洲的旅程拜訪好多城市。整趟上山下湖，順便精進開車技術(山路中九彎十八拐很多)。我最愛的植物園是在慕尼黑『寧芬堡Nymphenburg』華麗澎湃的皇宮右側有個植物種類豐富的美麗大花園！逛啊逛的，看也看不膩
❤️謝謝貓媽皇太后數年前的今日把我生下來，讓貓兒經歷人生中的酸甜苦辣與美好，更珍惜每一天！生日快樂＆母難日辛苦了🎂🎂🎂謝謝妳。

 So glad that we arrived at home safely from our long journey. In this two weeks
long vacation, we visited many cities. The most beautiful botanical garden we
have ever seen was at Nymphenburg in Munich. There were so many different
special flowers and trees in this big garden. I'm very thankful that my mum and
I were able to spend some time together. My birthday is coming soon and this
trip was an early present from her to me! #德國 #慕尼黑 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #寧芬堡 #遊記 
#Germany #München #KaidongWithKat #Nymphenburg #BotanischerGarten

[08. Sep. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 好感謝住在慕尼黑的朋友CH帶我們去挖寶！大城市裡亞洲店真不少。連日式用品也有歷史悠久的店面呢❤️
貓貓極愛東洋風格的飾物，一進入這個店就瞬間失心瘋發作了，差點忘了時間....下次還要去！Ps: 日式雜貨舖官網：http://japanalia.de/ 

 I was so happy our friend showed us such a nice Japanese shop in Munich. It not
only has tableware but also lots of furnitures, paintings, clothes and
accessories! I stayed in the shop for a long time! In the future when we go to
munich, I have to visit it again! It's homepage: http://japanalia.de/ #德國 #慕尼黑 
#生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #遊記 #Germany #Munich #KaidongWithKat #trip #shopping

十月中旬是Mr.櫻與貓兒的結婚紀念日，我們約好每年這個時候都回到當時慶祝婚禮的餐廳一起用餐🥗🍽這個餐廳在薩爾斯堡北部瑪特湖畔的迷你皇宮Schloss
Mattsee。它沒有其他奧地利皇宮的金碧輝煌，反而是樸實小巧。環繞著皇宮的湖岸景色優美。這次回來用餐巧遇兩對新人舉辦婚禮呢！這個景點幽靜清心是奧地利人很喜愛辦婚禮的地方。如果對薩爾斯堡郊外有興趣的朋友，貓兒推薦『瑪特湖』景點
🚌公車(薩爾斯堡120號巴士)🚗自駕(瑪特湖小鎮裡有三個停車場)都方便！

 Mattsee is one of most beautiful lakes around Salzburg, and Mr. Sakura and I
try to visit it every year. Near Mattsee is also a famous palace, called Schloss
Mattsee. While it is much smaller than the gorgeous Austrian-style royal
palaces, it is very lovely and charming, and also the home of a cafe. The sight
of the beautiful lake is why many Austrians like to have their wedding at this
place! If you plan to explore Salzburg countryside, I suggest you visiting this
place! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #瑪特湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat 
#Mattsee

貓兒一路帶著貓爸向北駛去，出了奧地利國境直奔捷克！我們經過南波希米亞州的首府『布傑約維采Budějovice』它算是捷克第三大城市，此處最出名的就是好喝的Budweiser
Budvar beer捷克百威啤酒原產地！

 老城從13 世紀就已經存在著，更保存滿滿文藝復興時期的建築風格。父女在城中散步，貓爸看來很喜歡古老巴洛克式的建築風格呢，不過他最愛的嗜好還是詳讀餐廳菜單🥘
🥗😆😉😃！

 I drove from Austria to Czech Republic with my dad. On the way there we passed
by a small city called Budějovický. This city is famous for its Budweiser beer
and history. We enjoyed walking though its old streets and beautiful
Baroque-style buildings. #捷克 #布傑約維采 #旅遊日記 #開動with貓 #CzechRepublic #Budějovice 
#trip #KaidongWithKat

親愛的貓友們冬至快樂❤️⛄️ 
久違了鹹湯圓，好想念你啊，在薩爾斯堡很難買到“金(紅)銀(白)糯米”小丸子，乾脆捲起袖子自己做吧。廚房就像個家庭實驗室，貓兒在研究室裡玩不夠，回家繼續玩！哎啊...真是職業病。今年冬至的鹹湯圓，搞定
😽開動吧！

 PS:傳統中紅(金)丸子象徵太陽，白(銀)丸子是月亮。過了這日，北半球夜晚漸漸變短，白晝緩緩加長囉！

 Oh, I miss traditional Taiwanese snacks so much! This time I made white and
pink-coloured rice dumpling balls with vegetable soup. This is also a kind of
special food for winter solstice! Let's enjoy it together! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

😽㊗️貓友們端午佳節快樂＆好運與喜悅接粽(踵)而來 !

 
這次把自己種的野薑花葉摘來包粽子，雖然有些捨不得...因為這幾片葉子整整養了去年一整年。野薑花種在溫帶的室內避寒，它成長的速度比在亞熱帶慢多了！話說回來舊的不去、新的不來，剪下老葉包粽子，期盼新葉趕快長出來。今年貓兒家的粽子多了一味
❤️淡淡的野薑香！

 We wish all our friends a joyful Dragon Boat Festival! This year I used the
butterfly lily's leaves to make Zongzi (rice pudding). This plant smells very
sweet, and I was happy with my Zongzi experiment! Hopefully next year butterfly
lily will have more leaves, so I can try making more different kinds of rice
pudding! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat 
#cooking

『魔幻噴泉Magic Fountain』的水舞是巴賽隆納超受歡迎的景點❤️
水舞觀賞完全免費。表演時間還沒開始就有許多人圍在附近等待！噴泉的位子在加泰隆尼亞美術館下方，完全不怕迷路，因為觀賞人潮非常多，只要跟著大眾走就對囉！附近到處都是“地攤夜市”呢，這樣的文化讓貓兒感到特別親切啊
😉當日壯觀的水舞短片po在留言第一樓📹👇

 Barcelona has a famous fountain just right in front of the national art museum
of Catalonia, which is called Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. It has a wonderful
water dance performance, and not only tourists but also local people like to
visit this fountain and enjoy the show! #魔幻噴泉 #西班牙 #巴賽隆納 #加泰隆尼亞 #伊比利亞半島 #旅行日記 
#開動with貓 #Spain #Barcelona #Catalonia #MagicFountain #KaidongWithKat

藏在薩爾斯堡郊外山谷中翠綠的『Bluntauseen伯倫陶湖』是Mr.櫻跟貓兒很愛去散步的秘境。觀光客少，卻又是數一數二的自然風景😻
群山綠湖的靜謐讓壓力完全放鬆。夏季裡它是個極好避暑的地方！
.
來旅遊的朋友若有更多時間在奧地利薩爾斯堡，一定要去郊外走走。 天然美麗的世外桃源處處都是，等著大家去探訪。
.
Located in the Salzburg countryside, there's a very beautiful emerald green
lake, which is called Bluntausee. This lake is surrounded by alpine mountains
and its colour is a unique fluorescent green. Its water is totally clear, you
can even see fishes are swimming inside.
.
Nowhere else in Salzburg city or countryside such a nice scenery can be found.
Also, If you would ask me about places that have less tourists, I'd say
Bluntausee is a good choice! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡郊區 #伯倫陶湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria 
#Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Bluntauseen #Bluntautal

[06. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary] 

 五六月的玫瑰開的很豪邁奔放！貓貓與小貓妹去維也納的美泉宮散步 (Schloss
Schönbrunn又稱雄布倫宮)整排壯觀的紅玫瑰牆好搶眼啊！巴洛克風格的皇宮周圍遊人如織，我們也跟上前去湊熱鬧，給紅玫瑰捧場🌹🌹🌹
入夏囉，她們整片在驕陽下綻放的熱情如火。

 The red roses in Schönbrunn Palace are in full bloom! This time my sister and I
went there for a long walk. The buliding style of the palace is Baroque
architecture, and it is so big that you can spend more than 5 hours by only
walking around in the garden! ! #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria 
#Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna #SchlossSchönbrunn

遠看似龍舟🧐🌸🚣‍♀近看是『花舟』
奧地利六月初有個一年一度的大慶典😽名叫『水仙花節』這個節日在巴特奥塞Bad Aussee小鎮＆格倫德爾湖
Grundlsee舉辦。整個活動前後超過5日，都與水仙花有關。PS:地點就在哈施塔特鎮Hallstatt隔壁湖

 
整個慶典到了最巔峰處(最後一日)鎮民把水仙花佈置的造型裝飾由車子從鎮中心展覽處載到湖畔，再從湖畔繫上浮板讓船拖著各式各樣的“花飾們”遊湖。整個活動好熱鬧，小鎮居民約5000人，參加這場活動的籌辦人員就超過3000人！今年的水仙花節貓兒也來湊個熱鬧，當成看“歐洲版溫馨龍(花)舟“囉
😉！

 In the beginning of June, the famous Daffodil Festival (Narzissenfest) takes
place in Bad Aussee, Austria. This town is very close to Hallstatt and easy to
find. 

 During this festival, villagers did prepare many daffodil decorated statues for
the exhibition, which is located in the village center. There was a daffodil
queen, as well as two princesses that needed to be elected. At the end of the
festival, all the flower statues were sent towards the lake and performed a nice
boat corso! 

 This year was my first time joining this event, and it gave me unforgettable
memories. #奧地利 #巴特奥塞 #旅遊日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #BadAussee #KaidongWithKat #Trip 
#Narzissenfest #DaffodilFestival

德國南部巴伐利亞的『Waging am See瓦京湖濱』是露營車＆露營帳篷的大本營🚚⛺️貓貓跟Mr.櫻發現除了一般露營車，湖畔多出有趣的"木桶狀"度假小屋！

 現在冬季小木屋是關閉的！哎唷，忍不住從窗戶裡偷窺一下，滿足貓的好奇心。完全可以想像夏季的熱鬧，住在木屋裡在湖畔烤肉＆游泳🏊‍♂️一定很熱鬧！真懂的享受生活。

 Waging am See is a big lake located in Bavaria. Around it, there are lots of
camping cars and tents. Mr. Sakura and I found a special wooden mini camping
house. This house is small but has bed, sofa , table etc. inside. It's so cute!
In the summer people can go swimming, have a BBQ, and spend the night in this
lovely small house! #德國 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #巴伐利亞 #瓦京湖濱 #Germany #WagingerSee 
#KaidongWithKat #Bavaria #WagingamSee

進入12月聖誕氛圍瞬間濃厚！每年例行去捧場聖誕市集，對貓兒而言百看不厭的總是這種像童話世界裡的手工小房子🏠點燈後更有氣氛呢！

 It's December now, the Christmas atmosphere in Europe is very strong! Every
year, I regularly visit Christmas markets around this time. My favorite shops
are those that sell small fairy houses. After turning on the light inside the
handmade house, it's even prettier! #德國 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #聖誕市集 #Germany #Halsbach 
#KaidongWithKat #christmasmarket

老實說住歐洲的日子裡貓兒幾乎天天“吃家裏”，平常是自己下廚，加上Mr.櫻日積月累在妻子的“潛移默化”下也練了一身好廚藝，我們真是一對宅夫妻很愛在家裡煮食，只有跟同事們聚會才出門外食。

 Pauli Stubm這間餐廳是貓兒同事們大推的奧地利傳統料理店家，它在老城堡的半山腰隱密的小街道裡。食物好吃又價錢划算，份量很大用材新鮮❤️
加上室內佈置古色古香還有個中庭花園，夏天在花園裡用餐吹風氣氛真好！它是貓兒難得喜歡的少數奧地利料理餐廳，每次去我都故意點不同的菜色試試看，到目前還沒有失望過哩
😍真心推薦給來薩爾斯堡的貓友們，它沒像其他餐廳打大廣告，但卻有曖曖內含光的實力啊！

 Normally We prefer to cook myself, and enjoy eating the dishes at home. Only in
occasional cases, such as a meeting with colleagues after work I'll go out for
dinner. 

 Located in Salzburg city center is a traditional Austrian cottage-style
restaraunt called "Pauli Stubm". It was recommended by my friends. This
restaurant can be found in a small street, halfway up to the hill, and not far
from Hohensalzburg fortress. The food there is very fresh and comes in big
portions! 

 I went to this restaurant several times alreay, and each time I ordered a
different meal. So far I'm very satisfied with their food quality and service! 
#奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

這幾日下了雨減溫許多，奧地利的氣溫回到涼涼的25度左右。小院的花兒受到雨水的滋潤變得格外有精神，雨後的小清新難能可貴啊！陸續開始收成院子裡的蔬菜了🥦🥒❤️
最愛新鮮採摘下來的風味！

 Recently, temperatures have gone down in Austria, because of rain. With it came
a great refreshment in Sakura family's garden! It's also the time to harvest
more and more vegetables. Fresh vegetables from your own garden are the best! 
#奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #小苑日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #gardening

刺子繡Sashiko(刺し子)是傳統的日式繡工。花樣很多🌸
從簡易的針法到進階各式各樣的幾何圖形，或創意做圖。貓兒還算是初階狀態，跟著圖板繡，這是個很放空的針線活，按照自己的喜好變換顏色！越接近結尾，成就感越來越大😻
就快完成一張方巾囉！

 Sashiko is a kind of traditional Japanese embroidery. It was used to strengthen
and decorate the homespun clothes of old times. I really like its geometric
patterns! Therefore, rainy days are often spent with making Sashiko at home.
This pink flower piece is almost finished! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

從一個國家的飲食就能了解它的文化！奧地利的飲食中咖啡與點心佔了好大的重心，無論什麼場合都能看見它的蹤影。早晨來一杯咖啡，用餐後來些點心，下午咖啡或茶都好，再來塊蛋糕更是完美！這次吃什麼好呢？就薩赫蛋糕吧，濃濃的巧克力味，一定要配茶點或咖啡才搭。

 Austrian coffee culture is world famous. One of my favorite coffee shops in
Austria is Café Sacher. Not only their coffee and cakes are delicious, but also
their interior design is very classical and elegant. #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #提洛爾省 
#茵斯布魯克 #薩赫咖啡館 #Tirol #Austria #Innsbruck #KaidongWithKat #CaféSacher

[10. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 
熱愛抹茶的貓兒能與抹茶專賣店『茶の間』在奧地利相遇真是太歡喜了！一度以為自己置身日本，其實它就在維也納的納旭市場/中央市場(Naschmarkt)旁邊。裡頭的店員親切地用日本口音的德語點餐，訪客絡繹不絕，各式各樣不同的抹茶點心＆飲料供大家選擇！生意非常好呢
👍歐洲人對東方文化的接受度很高。有一個小角落是專門販售日式茶具、茶點、茶葉。貓兒跟貓小妹點了冰沙🍵好解暑啊！

 I really like green tea products. In Vienna my sister took me to a Japanese tea
house! They served many different desserts. I was so happy to discover this shop
and we both ordered green tea smoothie and matcha ice cream! On such a hot
summer day it's a perfect refreshment! Yummy! #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna #Naschmarkt #ChaNoMa

灰濛濛的雪雲散去，天開了！庫倫洛夫小鎮出現藍天，雖然是氣溫是低的，但是在冬天裡看到陽光心情不自覺變得很好！在老街巷弄間散步著，呼吸潔淨冰涼的空氣。仰頭望藍天枯枝～時光靜好！

 Snow clouds have finally disappeared, and the sun comes out again! The blue sky
is so beautiful, and I really enjoyed the sunny days in Krumlov. It's a
colourful town with beautiful weather, like in a sweet dream. #捷克 #庫倫洛夫 #開動with貓 
 #CzechRepublic #Krumlov #trip #KaidongWithKat

[28. Jun. 2018 貓貓的工作日記 Kat's working diary]

 
才說仲夏是百合最燦爛的季節，這個禮拜貓兒完全被濃濃的百合香包圍！因為研究計畫裡必須用到它的花粉，近幾日來採收了上百朵花的雄蕊花藥，整個實驗室被大白花侵佔，這陣子聞到百合味
😂就暈暈惹！

 This week I have to harvest many lily flowers, because we need its anther and
pollen for the research! They are very beautiful but smell quite strong! I think
I need a break from smelling them soon! Haha!!! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

熱辣辣的夏天去看辣妹勁舞💃💃💃
朋友的私人舞蹈教室舉辦學期末發表會，當然得去給她捧捧場囉。此活動除了欣賞美女們曼妙的舞姿外主辦單位還準備自助餐(歐洲＆中東口味)外加二手舞衣大拍賣。

 最妙的是🐱
貓兒在表演教室裡巧遇大學時期的P教授，他的課程是必修的生物化學。原來P教授的太太在這場活動裡表演踢躂舞，熱愛彈吉他的他加入期末表演，變成師母的吉他伴奏！世界好小啊，竟然在私人舞蹈班發表會上巧遇以前的老師。多年後我們完全以不同的身份相見，他說還認得我(因為曾經考過他那門課的口試)～這次的偶遇太有趣也太巧合了！

 A few days ago, I was invited to a dance school summer festival. This event
didn't only feature beautiful performances, but also had a delicious buffet!
After the show, there was even a second hand market for dance dresses. 

 I was very surprised to meet my former biochemistry professor there. His wife
had a tap dance performance, which he accompanied by playing guitar. This world
is so small, we can always run into a friend on the way! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 
#開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

魚料理🐟貓兒很愛吃魚＆海鮮。可是櫻先生剛好完全相反。本來想試試看用魚柳加上糖醋的方式來哄騙不愛魚的人🤫
但不愛魚的人仍是不愛魚哪！枉費我一番用心...結果整盤香噴噴的糖醋魚柳還是得自己吃光光😼哎，算了！就想成：好吃的都留給我，感謝你不跟我爭囉！

 I really enjoy eating fish, so this time I made sweet and sour codfish fillets.
It was very tasty, even though the fish still had it's original scent. I tried
to cover it with fried vegetables and red sauce, but it still remained. However,
cats do like that smell, and so did I! Haha! Yummy! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 
#開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

今年四月份薩爾斯堡火車站旁剛蓋好的全新『景觀arte
Hotel』貓兒觀察它好一陣子。櫻媽媽跟我都很好奇裡頭的餐點與服務，抓緊機會我們婆媳倆人共同去品嚐它的早午餐🍰🥓🍳☕️🍹。

 
早餐型態從早上9點到11點吃到飽的自助餐，有鹹(煎蛋、培根、香腸、沙拉...)有甜(蛋糕、鬆餅、優格、麥片...)咖啡、茶、果汁、汽水無限暢飲。坐在餐廳裡慢慢吃，跟婆婆邊聊著家常事邊看風景，頓時把工作的壓力拋到腦後了
😊早餐就是要慢慢吃、開心吃、吃飽飽～開動❤️

 In Salzburg, arte Hotel just finished its construction earlier this year.
Sakura mama and I were very curious about the restaurant's food and ambience.
Therefore, we decided to visit this hotel for a brunch together.

 The breakfast is from 9 to 11 am, buffet-style. They offer fried eggs, bacon,
sausage, bread, cake, salad, cheese, coffee, tea, juice, etc. There are many
choices and it's all-you-can-eat! We also enjoyed the nice view of the city,
alongside the great atmosphere. Even though the interiors are modern and a
little sparse, it still felt relaxing and cozy! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

[10. Sep. 2018 貓兒小苑日記 Kat's garden diary]

 今年的夏天特別熱，櫻貓小苑的蔬菜水果收成好豐盛！櫻媽媽(婆婆)種了各式各樣的番茄，貓兒幫忙採收。新鮮吃配上沙拉味道真好，色彩也好豐富呢！

 This year Sakura family's garden had a big tomato harvest! They are so
colourful - red, yellow, orange and purple. I really like to eat them freshly
with salad. It's healthy and delicious! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria 
 #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #gardening

薩爾斯堡下了好多天的雨，這個週末是個大晴天！貓兒和朋友＆工作夥伴們趁著天晴小聚，大家一人帶一道菜慶祝五月份的壽星生日快樂。

 This weekend the weather got better again, so some friends and I had a lovely
birthday party in the garden. Everyone brought a dish, which was a nice idea,
because this way we could taste various foods from different kitchens. #奧地利 
#薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

冬季裡賞雪泡湯♨️是開心的小確幸！在德國南部-巴伐利亞境內，國王湖附近的{Rupertus Therme羅伯特溫泉會館} 是貓兒很愛的泡湯所在處。

 
它四周環阿爾卑斯山，室外的湯池有按摩水療、水流旋轉池。室內有兒童池、家庭池、冷熱湯、乾濕蒸氣浴(三溫暖)、健身房。餐廳＆休息區應有盡有！幽靜又美麗的泡湯處完全可以消磨一整日，夏秋室外還能野餐…每次來這心情是一整個放鬆！約三兩好友賞雪泡湯
❤️開心。

 In the cold winter, it is really nice to soak in a hot spring. There is a
famous thermal bath in the southern part of Germany - Bavaria, and near Salzburg
city (Austria), called Rupertus Therme. It is surrounded by the Alps and the
outdoor pool has a massage spa and a water flow rotating pool. My friends and I
enjoyed the relaxing time at this thermal spa. Swimming in the warm water is so
cozy, especially on a snowy winter day! ＃國王湖附近的溫泉會館 #德國南部 #巴伐利亞 #羅伯特溫泉 #開動with貓 
#Germany #RupertusTherme #BadReichenhall #KaidongWithKat

[16. Sep. 2018 貓兒小苑日記 Kat's garden diary]

 
秋天是收成的季節，今年蘋果的產量好棒！櫻貓家小苑裡除了普通品種，這次瑞士品種的紅心蘋果也長得很好哩，雖然成熟了但是他的果肉比一般蘋果酸許多，通常櫻媽媽都把它做成蘋果泥或蘋果醬，慢慢吃保存更久。
當然也可以拿它來烤蘋果蛋糕或其他點心囉！

 Autumn is the season for apple harvesting. This summer was very hot, so even
the rare red-fleshed apple (Redlove) had a big harvest! Redlove apple is more
sour than the normal apples, therefore Sakura mama used them to make lots of
delicious jam! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #gardening

[14. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 輕旅行維也納的日子裡，貓兒下榻在維也納總火車站附近的商旅。驚豔它的乾淨度，加上房間附有五臟俱全的小廚房！連洗碗機、烤箱、微波爐，應有盡有好貼心唷❤️
真是太方便了！就在火車站旁邊(公車、地鐵、輕軌處)，交通超級方便。房價划算，非常非常滿意😊

 During my short stay in Vienna, I spent the night in a cozy hotel near the new
central railway station (Wien Hauptbahnhof). I booked a single business room
with an inner yard view. The room wasn't huge, but included a lovely
kitchenette! It was clean, comfortable and had a reasonable price! If you are
looking for a place in Vienna to stay overnight, I would recommend it! #奧地利 #維也納 
 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #旅宿 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna 
#hauptbahnhofwien #SmartmentsBusinessWien #Smartments

[08. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 
其實...大城市裡貓兒最愛逛的是傳統市場，跟餐具＆家具店！感謝在維也納的當地私人伴遊“貓小妹”帶著貓貓到處闖蕩。納旭市場/中央市場(Naschmarkt)當然不能錯過，它最早起源於16世紀至今，既古老傳統又創新。鮮嫩的水果、蔬菜、肉類、起司，傳統奧地利食物＆異國料理應有盡有，此地是體驗人文生活的最好地方。逛得渾然忘我，走累了再去附近喝一杯日本人手製的抹茶冰沙，真是人生一大樂事也！

 I prefer shopping at the traditional markets to malls! Vienna Naschmarkt is the
central traditional market, which origins from 16th century. Here you can find
many food from different countries, lots of stalls and cozy restaurants. If you
want to know the living culture in Austria, you definitely shouldn't miss it! 
#奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna 
#Naschmarkt

我們家對『吃的決心』好執著啊，肯定是被貓爸遺傳到吃貨基因！很想念香草奶昔的味道(小時候的回憶)
可惜奧地利的M速食沒賣奶昔，放眼薩爾斯堡老城附近只有隔壁德國才賣。決定乾脆去國王湖買奶昔＆散步！

 
但人算不如天算...到了國王湖除了大群遊客，更多來滑雪的家庭，整個停車場大爆滿！繞了兩三圈找不到能夠落腳的地方，只好往反方向開到3公里以外的『國王湖小學』停車場。然後再走回湖畔的M速食店買朝思暮想的香草奶昔
➡️來回總共步行7公里路😱

restaurants sell no milkshakes, but we can find them in Germany. It was a very

back to the Königssee primary school for parking. So, just for a milkshake, we
walked more than 7 km in total. Next time I will make the milkshake by myself at
home! #德國 #國王湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany #Königssee #KaidongWithKat

 In July it's getting very hot, so I prefer to stay in a cool place such as in

 Hellbrunn palace is popular because of its magical water fountains and the

山上風光好⛰️
貓媽＆貓兒兩人自駕去一趟Innsbruck茵斯布魯克，這個地方最有名的就是美麗的阿爾卑斯山脈。趁著夏天的好天氣搭乘纜車上“北山Nordkette”散步健行，俯瞰老城市
❤️呼吸新鮮空氣活動筋骨！

 We drove to Innsbruck and visited the beautiful Nordkette mountain. Summer is
hot in the city, but on mountains it was still a bit cold! We enjoyed the fresh
air and the coolish temperature there a lot. It was a very nice trip! #奧地利 
#茵斯布魯克 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Innsbruck #KaidongWithKat #trip

高第Antoni Gaudí把聖家堂 La Sagrada Família 設計成『加泰隆尼亞現代主義風格』聖經故事雕刻在教堂外觀上。而內殿樸實宛如一座白色森林
🌲柱子是樹幹，拱頂為樹葉，藉著開枝散葉的樹枝撐起整座空間，中間穿插著花朵的圖案。核心空間設計貫徹「大自然即是結構」的原理。
.
陽光穿透彩繪玻璃，將五彩的光影投映在乳白大理石牆上，光線讓整個巨大的建築富有生命力！完全符合聖經『神就是愛，神就是光』的理念。教堂的設計象徵『光線＆大自然＆生命』緊密結合
❤️如此壯觀的景象攘我覺得人類好渺小，教堂裡當時Ave Maria(聖母頌)悠揚響起，令人沈醉其中！樸實與華麗同時出現在這幢巨作裡～除了震撼仍是震撼啊！
.
The Sagrada Familia church was designed by Antoni Gaudí. He was inspired by
nature, light and colours. Outside of the building, the various architectural
sculptures are originally Christian symbols, taken from the Holy Bible. Each of
the 18 towers has a special meaning. The 12 towers on the 3 façades represent
the 12 Apostles, the middle tower is the symbol for Jesus Christ, and around it
are four towers representing the Gospels. Finally, the lower tower is dedicated
to the Virgin Mary.

 Inside the church, Gaudí planned a harmonious lighting for the visitors to
self-contemplate. All the columns are symbolising wood and forest. When daylight
comes through the colourful glasses into the church, it creates a wonderful
atmosphere for introspection. Gaudí was a genius - his church is such a
breathtaking architecture! #西班牙 #巴賽隆納 #加泰隆尼亞 #伊比利亞半島 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Spain 
 #Barcelona #Catalonia #IberianPeninsula #trip #KaidongWithKat

好喜歡這樣祥和的氣氛。黃昏太陽暖暖的照在阿爾卑斯山脈，讓人無法相信同一日的下午楚格峰山頂遭受強烈冰雹、大雨、颳風打雷的景象。我們在小鎮散步，已經能夠感受一絲絲初秋的氣息！太陽下山，溫度迅速降低許多，傍晚在旅館附近散步一大圈就回房休息了。

 This time our dining table was decorated in red for celebrating grandfather's

 June and July are the seasons for hydrangeas in central Europe. In Austria you

 Vienna has a lot of Japanese restaurants and snack shops. It's a very small and

friends told me that they have this kind of apple trees at home. Therefore, I
went to visit their garden! The white apple's name is called "Weißer Klarapfel"
in German, which means "White Transparent". It tasts a bit sour, but smells very
good! People use it to bake desserts or just eat it directly! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記

捷克自駕旅行途中我們拜訪了『赫盧博卡(琥珀卡)城堡🏰Hluboká Castle』它座落在České
Budějovice捷克的布傑約維采(CB)城市不遠處的山腰上。這座城堡的命運與外型完全取決於他主人的愛好而改變！

 
城堡外型原已13世紀波希米亞國王指定的歌德風格建造，數百年後經由多次轉手慢慢改建變成巴洛克式，然後又改成浪漫主義風格。至今保存著“浪漫風”的模樣成為觀光聖地！城堡裡華麗精緻，可惜嚴禁拍照攝影(內部照片來自本堡官網)。

 Hluboká castle (Schloss Frauenberg) is situated in Hluboká nad Vltavou and it
is very famous in the Czech Republic. This castle was rebuilt many times. It was
started as a Gothic style building in the 13th century and got changed into an
extravagant Baroque style in the 18th century. In the 19th century it was
reconstructed again into Romantic style, and became a museum for everyone. It's
not allowed to take photos and video inside the building, therefore all the
indoors pictures I used are from the Hluboká castle webpage. #捷克 #赫盧博卡城堡 #旅遊日記 
#開動with貓 #CzechRepublic #HlubokánadVltavou #trip #KaidongWithKat

 Although, I'm busy at work, I still try to make experiments in the kitchen.

watch their performance! #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #Wien #Vienna

四月中輪到奧地利櫻花開。美麗的粉紅色花海，放眼四周好多社區都被她包圍🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸沈浸在浪漫的春天裡！

 The beautiful April season is full of cherry blossoms! It only comes once a
year! I missed it so much! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat

[30. Jul. 2018 貓兒小苑日記 Kat's garden diary]

 呦呼😺
撒花撒花～超開心！這幾天奧地利爆熱，就在汗流浹背的日子裡貓兒種下的『蝶荳花』冒出美麗的藍紫色“小精靈”了！期盼好久好久終於開花呢，去年沒有發芽，今年好不容易挑戰成功。要在溫帶把他種出來真不容易，好開心
✌先來泡杯蝶荳花茶呢！

 I'm so happy that this summer my butterfly pea is bloming! I tried to plant it
last year, but it wasn't very successful. This February I started to grow it
again, and finally in this hot summer we got beautiful blossoms! Let's make a
cup of butterfly pea tea, it has indigo and violet colors! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #gardening

今年入冬的第一場家庭火鍋！貓小妹來找我玩，貓兒開車帶她一起去鄉下小住，感受與世無爭的環境。我們在民宿裡開迷你火鍋趴(附廚房)，能在德國南部貝希特斯加登Berchtesgaden藍紹小鎮Ramsau一起吃火鍋真難得！感覺就像在家裡
 ❤️PS:雖然有附廚房與共用餐居，但是貓兒堅持用自家的鍋具(搬的我好重啊)連電磁爐都自備了！開動😽😻

 Recently, my sister visited me. Together we went to the countryside overnight.
The hotel in Ramsau, Berchtesgaden was very nice, our room even had a small
kitchen. In there we cooked our first hot pot for this winter, it was very
delicious! #德國 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #巴伐利亞 #藍紹 #辛特湖 #Germany #Ramsau #KaidongWithKat 
#Bavaria #Hintersee

莫札特住處旁的老咖啡店雖然貓兒常常經過，但是從來沒有好好停下來關注＆捧場它。這麼多年來這竟然是頭一次登門拜訪呢😉
結論是很滿意！本次喝咖啡＆吃蛋糕，下次來嚐嚐他們的輕食好了。哎啊...我真是隻宅貓，除了上班就是在家裡，平時應該多出門嘗試不同的餐廳才對！

 Just right near the Mozart residence (Mozarts Wohnhaus) is an old cafe. Usually
I walked past it without a glance! So it was my first time visiting this shop,
and I will definitely go there again on a sunny day to sit in the garden and
enjoy a meal! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

[06. Jul. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 這間在薩爾斯河畔的老咖啡店Café Bazar地點好棒😉
座落在市中心！夏季晴天時大家喜歡坐在室外，加上有樹蔭遮陽不怕曬又能看到河畔美景，許多當地人一坐就是整個下午。難得貓兒跟櫻媽媽(婆婆)＆外婆三代同堂來此喝下午茶
☕️這條路每天上下班都要經過，能夠在此處靜下心來閒話家常＆吃點心、好好享受音樂老城裡的風景～開心！

 Café Bazar is located nearby Salzach river in Salzburg city center! This old
coffee house is quite famous. In the summer many people like to sit outside and
enjoy their tea time together. Recently, I went with Sakura mama and grandmum
for our ladies afternoon meeting! We had a very nice time😊! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
 #餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #CaféBazar

[26. Jul. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 
今天下班後貓兒從奧地利“跨國”去德國拜訪好久不見得朋友，一轉眼認識14年了...真不可思議時間過的如此快速！初識時她正要念中學、我剛入大學，現在我們都出社會工作，能碰上一面好不容易啊！剛好她這趟從德國北部回到南部(就在奧地利附近)抓緊機會好好敘舊
❤️整個下午在德國郊外的鄉間小路散步聊天，能夠看到對方健康開心就是幸福！

 This evening after work, I visited my friends in Germany (Weildorf). We have
known each other since 2004, how fast time flies! Now we are living in different
cities which are far away! She is having a short holiday and came back to
Bayern, therefore we were able to meet. It was nice to see her again, and I wish
she will enjoy the time with family and old friends! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

好想念台灣小吃唷！嘿嘿~這盤是什麼呢？豬血糕？不不不！它是貨真價實的『黑木耳糕』(偽豬血糕)健康素食路線，而且做法好簡單呢。只要把糯米泡1小時左右把多餘的水瀝掉，加入適量海鹽＆五香粉，接著與打碎的木耳和糯米粉跟一些水攪拌均勻讓他們“黏糊糊在一起”用電鍋蒸一蒸，就完成囉！開動啦
😽健康木耳糕，好吃咧。

 This dish was made with sticky rice and black jelly ear (Holunderpilz). It's a
kind of a salty rice cake. Although it looks not so common, it's very tasty!
This cake is healthy, let's try a piece! #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

喜愛藝術與馬賽克拼貼的活潑圖案，貓兒超推薦到西班牙-巴賽隆納-高第建築師設計的『奎爾公園Park
Güell』逛一逛！裡面的建築物不僅像童話世界般的場景，就連每面牆都有自己的特殊的拼貼花樣！公園裡除了野餐散步、更能聽到街頭藝人的表演，觀賞特殊的高第建築風格。貓兒跟小妹逛的意猶未盡哪
❤️ 

 Park Güell is a famous sightseeing place in Barcelona, designed by Gaudí. All
the buildings there are decorated by mosaic art. We had a nice picnic in this
beautiful park. I really like those lovely fairy tale-style houses, and enjoyed
the time there. #奎爾公園 #西班牙 #巴賽隆納 #加泰隆尼亞 #伊比利亞半島 #旅行日記 #開動with貓 #Spain #Barcelona 
 #Catalonia #ParkGüell #KaidongWithKat

這幾日奧地利又變冷了😂
才說春暖花開天氣卻冷颼颼，只要雨就這樣。春天氣候的變化實在說不準，氣象報告說這個星期六還有再度下雪的可能哩！回味一下今年春初美麗的花兒吧！時光匆匆，轉眼這一季的櫻花已經謝了...

 In the last few days it got colder again in Austria, and there was even a
little snow rain on the weekend. Cherry flower season has passed again, so here
are some other flower photos from this spring. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

貓兒原本跟麻吉約好一起去逛街買女孩兒的冬衣，由於天氣太好所以我們突然轉變計畫，乾脆把車子開到動物園～擇日不如撞日，這就散步去！好久沒有逛薩爾斯堡的動物園，沒想到氣溫雖低但是小動物特別活潑，這次看到的比往常更多呢
😺🙉🐯🐰🐿️在園內我們倆將近走了4小時😉完全可以媲美逛街購物的火力～呵呵，好療癒啊！

 Originally, my friend and I wanted to go shopping at Salzburg outlet. However,
the weather was very nice, so we decided to go to Salzburg Zoo instead. We saw
lot of animals even though the weather was cold! I was very happy that we
changed the original plan. At the zoo we definitly had more fun! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #動物園 
 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #ZooSalzburg #KaidongWithKat

這幾天薩爾斯堡大學同事們間共同的話題都繞在『屍臭味 - 巨花魔芋Titan
arum』上，因為德國Frankfurt法蘭克福植物園贈送Salzburg薩爾斯堡大學植物園幾棵全世界最大的花卉品種🌺『巨花魔芋』藉此增進友誼😊
今天正是大綻放的日子！

 下午電視台跑來攝影做報導。雖然我們都乖乖在實驗室裡上班，但心思卻放在這棵寶貴的巨花魔芋上😛它綻放期會散發出死屍臭味😂🤢😱
吸引喜歡腐臭的昆蟲來幫忙傳遞花粉。
為了迎接屍臭味的巨花，今晚大學的溫室特別開放到半夜12點讓大家參觀。有興趣看開花狀態的朋友們可以連結Titanenwurz巨花魔芋的現場網頁(已照片呈現，須要不停reload)：
https://www.uni-salzburg.at/index.php?id=210019

 A few weeks ago Salzburg university's botanical garden received a valuable gift
from Frankfurt botanical garden. It is the biggest flower in the world, named
Titan arum. 

 Today is its flowering day, therefore many people come to visit! To see its
full blooming, tonight the university is open until midnight. After work, my
friends and I went to see this flower and smell it's "fragrance"! 

 Actually, I'd describe the smell like cheese with fish and acid. It is very
intensive and may even trigger headaches. Either way, it was a special
experience for me! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

[14. Sep. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary] 

 新天鵝堡Schloss
Neuschwanstein山腳下的阿爾卑斯湖Alpsee在夏末晴天裡閃著粼粼波光的水綠色。早晨微涼游泳的人不多，反而是小朋友喜歡在湖畔戲水！過了中午氣溫爬升至32度左右，許多熱愛湖泳的人紛紛下水解暑。貓兒與媽媽沿湖散步，森林與湖畔相依相擁。看看書、走一走，見到喜歡的地方就鋪開野餐毯子坐下休息，午餐遠離喧囂在水波斑斕的景致裡野餐。慢慢散步、聊天、細細品嚐風景是一件很開心的事！

 The Alpsee lake is very beautiful. Its colour starts with emerald green, and at
the middle of the lake the deep water becomes navy blue! We spent a whole
morning having a long walk around it. From the far side of the Alpsee we saw two
beautiful castles in front of us (Schloss Neuschwanstein + Schloss
Hohenschwangau). This scenery was so peaceful, I felt the time was freezing at
this moment! #德國 #巴伐利亞州 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #新天鵝堡 #阿爾卑斯湖 #遊記 #Germany #Bavaria 
#KaidongWithKat #NeuschwansteinCastle #Alpsee

[12. Jul. 2018 櫻貓家小苑日記 Sakura family's garden diary]

 這幾日下雨下不停，繡球花反而開得特別好！社區附近家家戶戶圓滾滾的繡球同時綻放，各種顏色相互呼應著。看見繡球花讓貓貓想起卡通『龍貓 /
となりのトトロ』其中有一幕姐妹倆在田野間的地藏王祠裡躲雨，夏天日本雨季裡繡球開的好燦爛，奧地利也正是這個時節呢～雖然在不同國家，卻忍不住哼起充滿兒時回憶的龍貓卡通旋律♪♭♫♬♯！

 My first time to find out about the hydrangea flower was from an animated film
called "My Neighbour Totoro (tonari no totoro)". In this story, the blue
hydrangeas were blooming beautifully on a rainy summer day. In Austria it's now
time for hydrangea season! Every time I see them near the streets, they remind
me of watching the film in my childhood! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記

[18. Jun. 2018 貓貓的廚房日記 Kat's kitchen diary]

 粽子節快樂❤️❤️這次端午節貓兒在奧地利包了人生第一串『鹼粽』因為苦無粽葉所以用“烘培紙”代替，沒想到成功哩！今天用鹼粽跟朋友交換了新鮮大肉粽，好幸福的感覺
😊㊗️貓友們端午快樂＆平安健康！

 Happy Dragon Boat Festival! This weekend I made my first rice dumplings, even
though I didn't have any bamboo leaves! My friend and I had a rice dumpling
exchange. I gave her mine and she gave me traditional dumplings! Yummy!!! #奧地利 
#生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

連續幾日秋高氣爽，金黃光輝十月是短暫而美麗的季節不能蹉跎浪費！貓貓與櫻媽媽(婆婆)、外公＆外婆趁著好天氣一起去南部酒莊採購庫存。奧地利的南邊丘陵是片片一望無際葡萄園
🍇那裡正是奧地利🇦🇹️＆斯洛維尼亞️🇸🇮️兩國交接處。風景與薩爾斯堡完全不同呢，另一種美，好喜歡這樣的週末輕旅行！

 Recently, the weather has been very nice. On such a wonderful sunny October day
we went to Steiermark (south Austria) to buy wine and pumpkin oil. This winery
area is very beautiful, especially in autumn. We really enjoyed this trip. #生活日記 
 #開動with貓 #施泰爾馬克省 #酒莊大道 #Steiermark #Austria #Weinstrasse #KaidongWithKat

今年聖誕節奧地利特別暖🌨
平地的雪融化了，只剩下雨。好想念白皚皚的世界，貓兒跟Mr.櫻兩人衝到薩爾斯堡鄰近Hochschwarzeck高黑角山區(國王湖附近)它屬於德國南部-貝希特斯加登境內，緊挨著奧地利邊境
❄️在山上感受雪地裡的冬季！平地下雨⛄️只有海拔高的山才下雪。

 We miss the white snowy winter so much! On Christmas day, Mr. Sakura and I went
to Hochschwarzeck mountain to feel the real winter atmosphere! This place is a
skiing area and not far from Salzburg city, located in Germany. We had a nice
time and built snowmen there. #開動with貓 #生活日記 #德國 #巴伐利亞 #貝希特斯加登 #藍紹 #高黑角 
#Hochschwarzeck #Ramsau #Berchtesgaden #Bavaria #Germany #KaidongWithKat

[08. Jul. 2018 貓貓的廚房日記 Kat's kitchen diary]

 
之前看過『深夜食堂』電視劇，最近迷上它的漫畫。看著...看著...變成極度想吃日式定食，有樣學樣的展開『貓兒食堂』的不歸路。今天煮三色丼(さんしょくどん)。Mr.櫻很喜歡，唯一他不能接受的是中間的醃酸梅。其他照片是近期的煮食日記，雖然人在歐洲，但是餐桌風景完全是亞洲路線(心與胃緊緊繫著亞洲呀
❤️)！

 The last few weeks I'm reading a Japanese manga (comic) which is called
Midnight Diner しんやしょくどう! All the stories are about food and life stories of the
customers. People always miss the food from their childhood or some very
important events! During reading I really want to try their food! The following
photos show the dishes that I tried to cook from this book. #奧地利 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#餐桌日記 #薩爾斯堡 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

[06. Aug. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 週末去公婆家“蹭飯”！有個廚藝好&高審美觀的婆婆真是幸福啊，光是看她做的手工蛋糕眼睛就很開心(蛋糕裡的酸栗是小苑收成的唷)😊
眼睛吃，嘴巴也吃！有吃又有拿(裝了一大盒回家)幸福滿滿❤️開動唷～謝謝婆婆的愛心蛋糕😻

 Thanks so much to Sakura mama for the beautiful and delicious fruit cake! I
really like it! 😘 The afternoon tea time with family was very nice. Even though
it was a hot summer day, we enjoyed it very much! Thx a lot!!! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 
#開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

[02. Jun. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary] 台灣之光🇹🇼合唱比賽

 
這週末去了一趟維也納看合唱比賽。好感動好感動，激動到貓貓在拍短片的當下手忍不住微微顫抖！泰雅族『新竹尖石嘉興合唱團』的小朋友們與老師們在克服資金短缺的過程中順利到達奧地利的首都維也納參加『第三十一屆
法蘭茲-舒伯特國際合唱賽』清澈活潑的聲音勇奪：金質獎＆大會特別獎！非常有榮幸能夠看到現場的比賽，因為太激動了...不好意思，短片貓貓拍得有點手抖😂
孩子們真的是太棒了🇹🇼😘👍左下角轉HD畫質，全場公開比賽4首曲子15分鐘，無售票，歡迎分享。

 This weekend a Taiwanese kid choir "Hngzyang na Matui" attended 31st
"Internationaler Franz-Schubert-Chorwettbewerb" in Vienna, Austria and won the
Gold & Special Prize! The group is so young and cute, but they have such nice
voices! They must have practiced a lot and worked so hard for it! I'm so proud
of them. #奧地利 #維也納 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Wien 
 #Vienna

今年貓兒特別去探訪了『隱藏版的聖誕市集』它躲在森林裡🌲🌲🌲
總覺得聖誕市集就是個屬於"宗教氣氛濃厚的夜市"盼了整年，終於在年底有夜市可以逛(可惜沒有賣蚵仔煎)！

 
距離奧地利薩爾堡老城最近的隱藏版聖誕市集是在德國境內Halsbach小鎮，那裡賣的東西非常多樣化！連食物也跟大城市不太一樣，能夠在森林裡吃到松露手工麵真是讓我太驚豔了
❤️

 其實奧地利＆德國都有很多這種森林裡的聖誕市集，通常都在郊外，只要搜尋德文關鍵字(森林聖誕市集)：Waldweihnachtsmarkt 或
Waldadvent，就能找到很多好逛的地方。歡迎貓友們分享🐱好玩到相報囉！ 

 This winter we visited a special Christmas market in Halsbach (Germany). It is
hidden in a big forest. I really liked the atmosphere, many small wooden houses
in a big coniferous forest. How beautiful it is! #德國 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #聖誕市集 
#Germany #Halsbach #KaidongWithKat #christmasmarket

薩爾斯堡老城因為『真善美The Sound of Music』電影場景在此拍攝而舉世聞名！貓兒跟櫻媽媽這週末也來捧場🐱
真善美的木偶劇。演出的過程中聽到熟悉的旋律忍不住想跟著唱....
Do, a deer, a female deer
Ray, a drop of golden sun
Me, a name I call myself
Far, a long, long way to run
Sew, a needle pulling thread
La, a note to follow Sew
Tea, a drink with jam and bread
That will bring us back to Do
Do-re-mi-fa-so-la-ti-do-so-do!
.
This weekend we went to Salzburg marionette theatre to see the Sound of Music
musical. During the performance, I wanted to sing along with the familiar
melodies several times. It was very enjoyable!
#奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

[10. Aug. 2018 貓貓的微日記 Kat's mini diary]

 摸土玩陶貓兒好愛❤️
除了做碗、盤、杯子，把奧地利白陶變成耳環與項鍊也很有趣呢。先捏出造型接著高溫定型，然後畫上可愛的塗鴉，再一次高溫定色。手作成品剛好配當日衣服顏色，不同心情搭不一樣的陶飾。不過老實說畫這種小圖案真的很費眼力＆時間呢(通通畫好超過5小時)！

 I really enjoy making ceramic and pottery. Not only bowls and plates, but also
jewelries. This time I made several pairs of earrings, as well as necklaces.
It's very nice to have different ceramic jewelry sets that suit with my clothing
styles. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #餐桌日記 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat

text:
回到家幾日了～但貓兒的心仍停留在斯洛維尼亞『Bled布萊德小鎮』依依不捨啊！
.
布萊德沈靜的湖水看似廣闊，但只要認真走起來以成人的步伐2小時左右可以逛完整圈。搭船遊湖再到中間的小島散步賞景非常直得體驗。
.
讓貓兒跟Mr.櫻最難忘的部分是登山爬上Ojstrica岩石頂，它比我們想像中還難攀爬，路程是越來越陡，到最後一段攀上岩峰的過程可以說是“單行道”來往的人群得互相讓位，穿舒適的登山鞋來走這段路途肯定是很大的幫助。山路雖然艱辛，登頂後的風景讓我毫無遺憾
❤️心不知不覺就留在這處美景了！
.
We are back from our Slovenia trip, but I still miss Bled lake very much!

 It looked quite big, but it only took us about one and half hour to walk around
its shore. Traveling by the traditional small boat to the island was also lots
of fun. However, the most unforgettable part of this trip was to climb up to the
top of Ojstrica, which is a mountain in the Kamnik–Savinja alps which has a
sharp, pyramid-shaped top.

 It was quite difficult to reach it, because of the steep and rocky way up. We
were very happy that we were able to handle the especially difficult last part.
On the top the amazing view of lake Bled was very moving. It definitely was
worth it climbing all the way up. #斯洛維尼亞 #布萊德湖 #日記 #開動with貓 #KaidongWithKat 
#Slovenia #LakeBled

Main
Tower『美茵塔』是德國朋友介紹貓兒到法蘭克福很值得參觀的景點。此建築總共56層樓，240公尺高。塔頂除了可以俯瞰美麗的市井，53樓有個知名的景觀餐廳。貓兒本來是想看白天的景色，由於冬季天黑得早...逛街不小心逛過頭，到美茵塔下午4點多已經開始天黑
😝在誤打誤撞的情況下看到了美麗的法蘭克福夜景！
.
隨著太陽西沈，夜幕逐漸低垂，天空的顏色越來越暗，整個城市點起盞盞明燈。居高臨下看著附近的建築，甚至能夠清楚看見附近銀行辦公室裡的動態！許多人都還在努力上班中。這時後偵探＆當狗仔的心情就出來了
😂貓兒好奇心很重，瞧～每扇窗裡都有不同的故事哩😛！

 One of my German friends recommended me that if I visit Frankfurt, the Main
Tower is the place I should go! This skyscraper is named after the Main river,
it's 240 meters high and has 56 floors. In addition to the wonderful cityscape,
there is a well-known sky restaurant on the 53rd floor.

 Originally I wanted to see the scenery from Main tower on daytime, but I
strolled around too long in the city. After 4 o'clock in the afternoon it gets
dark very soon in Winter. Therefore, I instead got a view of the beautiful night
scene of Frankfurt. As the sun went down, the sky becomes darker and darker, and
the whole city lights up.

 From up there, through the windows I could clearly see that many people were
still working hard. It felt like being a detective or a paparazzi. Haha!
However, sometimes watching other people can be like witnessing a story, and
each window had a different one to tell! #德國 #法蘭克福 #美茵塔 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany 
#MainTower #Frankfurt #KaidongWithKat #trip

瑪特湖，在薩爾斯堡州的北部。它一直是貓兒與Mr.櫻極愛散心的寧靜湖泊。這潭美麗的湖水在午後的陽光裡恬靜而慵懶、粼粼的波光規律的蕩漾。在晴朗的秋陽下湖心閃閃發亮，襯著色彩多變的樹葉
❤️坐在湖畔餐廳喝下午茶，享受美景真是人生一大滿足啊！除了自駕，從薩爾斯堡火車站前搭🚌Bus120號到Mattsee Ortsmitte站下車即能到達此湖。

 Mattsee is one of our favorite lakes, and Mr. Sakura and I like to visit it
very much. This lake has a beautiful bluish colour. With the foliage turning
amber brown, it offers a beautiful contrast. There's less tourists, and most
visitors are local people. So you can enjoy the nice landscape and the calm
atmosphere with a hot cup of coffee right beside the lake. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡州 #瑪特湖 
#旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Mattsee

11月中旬許多歐洲各大城市的聖誕市集正式開張囉！薩爾斯堡當然不例外，從上星期開始市區陸陸續續在各個街道吊燈飾🎄🎄🎄
工作人員們忙進忙出籌備著市集的大小事。入冬後晚上五點開始天空一片漆黑，這些照片都是貓兒下班後在傍晚5-6點市區散步拍的，漆黑的夜空彷彿是入夜好久。市集裡五顏六色的裝飾品
❤️讓聖誕氣氛越來越濃厚呢(2019年11月底，拜訪的第1個聖誕市集)！

 In Austria many Christmas markets open in mid November, and so does the one in
Salzburg! A week ago I already saw people hanging up light chains as
decorations. This not only signals the start of Christmas time, but also the
whole city becomes way livelier and more crowded than before. These photos were
taken after my work, around 5-6 pm. However, the sky was completely dark, and it
looks like as if it was 8 or 9 o'clock in the night! It's that, and the more
quiet moments in the evening, that make me feel the Christmas atmosphere! #奧地利 
#薩爾斯堡 #聖誕市集 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip 
#ChristmasMarket

聖沃夫岡小鎮是個迷人的地方，整個鎮裡的建築色彩豐富，全都列入文化保護區不能隨意加蓋與變動。11月底開始從『白馬飯店Weisses Rössl』
到『黑馬飯店Schwarzes
Rössl』中間的小廣場擺滿了聖誕市集的攤販，一直延伸到整條Markt街尾。街上是濃郁的節慶氛圍，天色暗下來後街道上點起巨型蠟燭增加氣氛，非常熱鬧！(2019年拜訪的第3個聖誕市集)
.
旁邊的白色教堂「朝聖教堂」是居民的信仰生活中心，裏頭漂亮的祭壇雕飾與天花板壁畫都別錯過囉，他們是名雕刻家米夏埃爾．帕赫（Michael
Pacher）1480年左右就完成的巨作。

 Sankt Wolfgang (Saint Wolfgang) is a colourful town, with its buildings
belonging to culture protection. Recently, the little Christmas market of this
town opened on the square between Weisses Rössl and Schwarzes Rössl Hotel. You
can also find lovely vendors along the market street.

 In the evening, when it's getting dark outside, people will light candles,
which gives a great Christmas atmosphere. If you plan to visit, please don't
forget to see the white church in the center of the town, which is called
pilgrimage church St. Wolfgang. Inside you can see the famous altar carvings
from Michael Pacher which were made around 1480! #奧地利 #聖沃夫岡 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
 #Austria #KaidongWithKat #trip #StWolfgang

Bled布萊德小鎮旅程中我們的住宿選擇湖畔Hotel
Lovec旅館，會挑上它主要是距離湖畔很近。加上包早餐＆晚餐＆停車位。晚餐其實不一定包含，出發前貓兒詢問Mr.櫻，想要在外面找餐廳還是在旅館吃晚餐？他想了想回答：如果午餐已經是在外面，不如晚餐乾脆就在旅館吃吧！結論是包晚餐這個決定讓貓兒很滿意，因為我們每日行程滿滿，下午4:30左右太陽就開始下山，傍晚5點後室外是漆黑一片，晚餐在旅館裡實在是省事又放鬆！
 
.
從我們房間的陽台可以直接看到布萊德湖中小島。早晨7點的風景暖暖的陽光擁抱著小島上的教堂，一大早起床就能欣賞這個景色❤️😽😻實在好滿意啊！

 During our stay in Bled, Slovenia our accommodation was Hotel Lovec. The main
reason we chose this residence was that not only it's located near the Bled
lake, but also offers a free parking place, as well as breakfast and dinner.
While breakfast is usually included with many hotels, this time we also booked
dinner. After a long day trip it's very comfortable to eat in the hotel and not
having to search around for a restaurant.

 From our room, we had a beautiful view of Bled lake and the famous island. In
the early morning, we could even see a brilliant sunrise scenery on the Bled
island. I was very satisfied with this accommodation.❤️ #斯洛維尼亞 #布萊德湖 #日記 
#開動with貓 #KaidongWithKat #Slovenia #LakeBled

『施特博爾Strobl』小鎮是沃夫岡湖畔很重要的轉運站！它不大，但是船跟巴士都會經過。聖誕節將近，這個小鎮也有自己的迷你聖誕市集，小小的很可愛呢❤️
直接就在湖畔。手中捧著熱紅酒，沿湖慢慢散步欣賞風景～愜意！PS:2019年拜訪的第2個聖誕市集。

 Strobl is a small village near Wolfgangsee (Wolfgang lake). It's small but a
very important transfer location. During the advent time, this town has it's own
lovely Christmas market just right near the lake. Drinking hot mulled Wine and
strolling along the lake shore is such a wonderful experience! #奧地利 #沃夫岡湖 #施特博爾 
#旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Strobl #KaidongWithKat #trip #Wolfgangsee

冬季的國王湖很安靜，這是今年入冬午後的風景。難得餐廳裡沒什麼遊客，貓兒開心地享受美食＆寧靜＆看書❤️
入夜後在Berchtesgaden貝希特斯加登小鎮逛聖誕市集，與學生時代的老朋友見面不亦樂乎～乾杯！PS:2019年，拜訪的第4個聖誕市集。

 In the winter Königssee is much quieter than in other seasons. It was my first
time being alone in a restaurant, enjoying the food and reading a book by
myself! In the evening, when it was getting dark, my friends and I went to
Berchtesgaden city center to visit the advent market. Let's have a cup of punch.
Cheers!!! #德國 #巴伐利亞州 #國王湖 #貝希特斯加登 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany #Bayern 
#KaidongWithKat #trip #Königssee #Berchtesgaden

12月份在歐洲就是要努力逛聖誕市集🎄與其說聖誕市集，貓兒更覺得它是炒熱冷冬氣氛的“夜市”。今年開車帶著櫻媽媽(婆婆)與櫻外婆去德國南部郊外拜訪『隱藏版 -
森林聖誕市集Halsbacher Waldweihnacht』這是櫻外婆在歐洲生活即將邁入90年...首次體驗森林市集，開車載外婆的時候她笑著說
：沒想到孫媳婦這麼會探險😉身為當地人的我都沒有去過，也沒有資訊！

 
貓兒：阿嬤～是因為現在網路資訊發達，只要google附近聖誕市集就很多消息啊！加上導航系統無所不能，比起以前口耳相傳＆看地圖的年代，現在實在方便多了！能夠帶著婆婆與外婆三代同堂一起郊遊是很開心的事，身體健康就是幸福啦
🍻一起乾杯！PS: 2019年12月份，拜訪的第6個聖誕市集。

 Visiting Christmas markets in cold December is a lot of fun! Recently, I drove
Sakura mama and grandma to Halsbach advent market, which was their first time
visiting this place. Sakura grandma told me that despite her living in Salzburg
for many years, I know even more places than her. Haha!

 However, thanks to the internet, nowadays we can look up nearby Christmas
markets online. The GPS system is also very useful and much easier than looking
at a map! Our generation is very lucky to have so many helping devices. Anyway,
having a nice trip with them was lots of fun! Hope everyone enjoys the days
before Christmas! #德國 #巴伐利亞州 #哈詩巴赫 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany #Bayern #Halsbach 
#KaidongWithKat #trip

今年到現在拜訪大大小小城鎮的聖誕市集，瑪特湖Mattsee是貓兒見到最迷你、也最浪漫的湖畔聖誕市集！他的攤販不多大概僅30幾個小舖子，部分在湖畔部分在教堂旁。雖然迷你但是氣氛非常好，特別是拿著熱熱的潘趣水果酒邊喝邊賞湖景
🎅🍻🎅聽著小廣場上播放的聖誕歌曲～好浪漫啊！ PS: 2019年12月份，拜訪的第8個聖誕市集。

 This year I visited several Christmas markets, and the one in Mattsee may be
the smallest, but it's also the most romantic one. This advent market only has
about 30 street vendors, partly along the lake, and some of them located near
the church. Although it is tiny, the atmosphere is very good. Drinking a hot
punch and enjoying the lake view, while listening to the Christmas songs playing
on the small square ~ it's so romantic! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡州 #瑪特湖 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Mattsee

德國『海德堡』是一座美麗又歷史悠久的老城市🏰
它的格局與奧地利薩爾斯堡頗為相似：同樣有河貫穿市區、市區中有城堡、山景包圍著、大學各系所分佈整個市中心裡。不過此城的腹地相對大薩爾斯堡許多。大大小小聖誕市集攤販在不同的廣場上都有聚落
🎅🎄太多可以看、可以玩的地方，大人小孩肯定都會喜歡呢！ PS: 2019年12月份，拜訪的第9個聖誕市集。

 Heidelberg is a beautiful and historic old city in Germany. Its cityscape is
similar to Salzburg, Austria. There's a river running through the city, and it
has old castles, mountains, as well as university buildings all over the town.
However, the central of this city is relatively bigger than Salzburg, and
there's even more shops and churches! Located on various city squares are
several Christmas market stalls. There are many things to see while strolling
through them. Both adults and children will love it, as there's something for
everyone! #德國 #海德堡 #聖誕市集 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany #Heidelberg #KaidongWithKat 
#trip

陰天的今日下午，貓兒有些百感交集，最終到了這一刻...收到薩爾斯堡大學人事部的電子郵件，請我過去一趟簽『贖身契(解約書)』年底準備跟這所緣分深厚的大學說再見了！幾年前也在同樣的地方簽下『賣身契(雇用契)』沒想到這輩子第一份工作獻給薩爾斯堡大學。
.
今年十月份，一場重要的會議決定了貓兒的人生方向，最終的結果通知新工作明年調職醫學大學。如今真的是得向母校道別與道謝的時刻！年底交接，把手邊的工作將轉給接下來的同事。真是不可思議，人生短短...從求學到工作，將近生命的一半都跟這所大學糾纏著。這麼深厚的緣分，轉瞬裡就要說再見了，實在百感交集啊
❤️長期並肩工作的朋友們＆同事們＆老闆們🏫我美麗的母校University of Salzburg後會有期！

 Today, in the afternoon I received an important email, which means a lot for
me. I spent almost half of my life studying and working at Salzburg university.
This email told me it's time to say goodbye.

 I'm very lucky that a new job is waiting for me, and the new tasks will be very
challenging and interesting. So I will definitely like it! 

 However, Salzburg university has been a big part of my life. Friends,
colleagues, labs, libraries, and of course its beautiful campus. All of it feels
so familiar, and like a big family! It will be hard to say goodbye, and I'll
miss you all! Thank you everyone! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat

這幾日的薩爾斯堡時不時下著雨！趁著假日，貓兒跟Mr.櫻散步到薩爾斯堡的城堡上，在城堡裡有小小的迷你聖誕市集，同樣也是走小而巧的路線☃️🧚‍♀️
這時在冷冷雨天裡來一杯熱呼呼的酸甜熱紅酒(無酒精-兒童版)俯瞰著市區的景色，開心滿滿！PS: 2019年12月份，拜訪的第11個聖誕市集
.
敬🥂薩爾斯堡給我們平靜樸實的日常生活，酸甜苦辣悲歡喜樂在這裡體驗，繼續為生活努力。敬，親愛的貓友🎁🎄🎅 #聖誕快樂 #願在世界每各處的大家平安喜樂 ❤️

 These days it's mostly alternating between rain and sunshine in Salzburg city.
In our free time, Mr. Sakura and I walked up to Festung Hohensalzburg castle,
which has a small Christmas market. There I got a cup of mulled wine
(alcohol-free-children's version) and had a view of the nice cityscape. 

 I'm very thankful to this old city. It's my second home town. So many memories
and experiences. I've spent almost half of my life here, enjoying the calm life
and beautiful landscapes. We wish all of our friends a peaceful time! Stay safe
and happy! Merry Christmas! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #KaidongWithKat 
#Salzburg

在薩爾斯堡市郊🏰著名的惡作劇花園噴泉『Schloss Hellbrunn 海爾布倫宮』又稱水泉宮，它的聖誕市集在當地是赫赫有名的呢❤️
除了熱鬧的市集攤販以外，入夜後美麗的噴泉花園更別有一番風味。甚至還有小動物區讓大人小孩一起參觀，以及小朋友會喜歡的迷你木製遊戲小屋。只要有空，我們都會過來沾些聖誕氣氛
🎄🎅入夜後皇宮的模樣與白天的景色感覺很不一樣呢！PS: 2019年12月份，拜訪的第5個聖誕市集。

 Schloss Hellbrunn is located on the south side of Salzburg city, and is very
famous for its "Hellbrunner Wasserspiele" (trick fountains). The Christmas
market of Schloss Hellbrunn is very well-known! It has not only many street
vendors, but also a beautiful night view of the different fountains. If you plan
to visit with your kids, there are many mini wooden houses for them to play in.
The night scenery of Schloss Hellbrunn is really romantic too, looking
completely different than during the day! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #海爾布倫宮 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
 #Austria #KaidongWithKat #trip #SchlossHellbrunn

好懷念英式下午茶的傳統茶點『司康scone』小圓餅。在奧地利的超市跟麵包店幾乎沒有它的蹤影！既然買不到乾脆自己來，其實司康的做法很容易，需要的食材也非常基本，貓兒特別喜歡原味的司康加上凝脂奶油clotted
cream與果醬，特別是剛烤好熱呼呼暖暖的餅皮剝開兩半夾上奶油配果醬實在是太完美了！Mr.櫻一次吃掉好多個，看來下次得多烤一點才夠吃啊😉 ❤️
.
這次特別感謝住在德國的朋友小飛Phaedra自己做的手工果醬小飛的任性食堂 🤗
她研發許多市面上沒有的獨家口味。讓貓兒非常驚豔的是『玫瑰佐酸櫻桃與草莓』這款花果醬。在甜中帶微酸的果肉又飄著淡淡玫瑰花香，而且還吃得到花瓣呢！這讓我印象實在太深刻
🌹🍒🍓口感與味覺極有層次，非常有亮點的組合🐱開動囉！

 I remember a few years ago I had some scones in a cafe in London. They were so
tasty! Recently, I missed this British dessert very much, but it's hard to find
in bakeries or supermarkets in Austria. Therefore, I decided to make scones by
myself. Actually, baking this dessert is not so complicated, requiring just a
few simple ingredients - like baking powder, butter, sugar, flour, milk, egg,
and a bit of salt. 

 The tastiest scone for me is just right after baking. Eating it with delicious
jam, which made by Phaedra from Germany, was the perfect combination, that you
can't find in a supermarket. Thanks a lot to Phaedra! I love her rugosa-rose
cherry & strawberry jam so much! It's sweet with a slight acidly taste, and I
can even smell the rose fragrance, as well as see the flower petals in her jam!
It's so delicious! Kaidong! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #cooking

搭飛機的時候貓兒特別喜歡坐靠窗戶的位置，雖然站起來動動腿＆去洗手間比較不方便，但是我總是對窗戶外的風景特別有興趣！尤其是在內陸上空的飛行俯瞰秀麗的山景、村莊、湖水
😍總覺得美不勝收。
.
最難忘的是看到薩爾斯堡上空無雪市區綠油油的景象對比著白皚皚雪地裡的郊區，顏色漸層而明顯的改變❤️天然就是美！

 Traveling by airplane, I prefer to have the window seat. Although it can be
inconvenient when you want to stand up and get some movement, or go to the
lavatory, but watching the scenery outside of the window is just so interesting
to me! 

 Last time I was very lucky! While flying over Salzburg, the weather was perfect
to see all the beautiful mountains, villages, lakes and forests. The contrast of
the greenish city and the snow covered countryside, and seeing how the landscape
changed and got more white was very beautiful to see! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip

『布萊德小鎮Bled』位於斯洛維尼亞🇸🇮西北方，靠近奧地利🇦🇹南部邊界，這個小鎮是非常熱門的風景區！湖畔峭壁上的城堡Bled
castle是斯洛維尼亞最古老的城堡之一。外觀屬於紅頂淡黃色牆壁建築，裡面設有：印刷坊、畫廊、小教堂、鐵具鍛造處、博物館、酒窖、協議室、餐廳、禮品部...從外表看來不大，但裡頭有許多內容能參觀。城堡旁邊山腳下的
St. Martin's Parish Church聖馬汀教堂內部非常華麗！到了布萊德小鎮，很直得進去教堂裡探訪。
.
我們一直計劃來拜訪這個小鎮，原本預定是今年的秋天。可惜Mr.櫻跟貓兒休假的時間“僑”不起來，加上兩人同時休假時布萊德湖偏偏都是陰雨天的多重因素。最後這個願望終於在2019年尾實踐跨年前的輕旅行
❤️特別感謝天氣配合，此趟冬季旅程日日都是大晴🌞好開心！

 Bled is a cozy town located in northwestern of Slovenia, which is not far from
southern Austria. It's a popular tourist destination, famous for the Bled castle
built on a cliff near the lake with the same name. The castle is one of the
oldest in Slovenia (more than 1000 years old), and on the inside visitors can
find a museum, restaurant, printing workshop, wine cellar, iron forge, knights
hall etc. There's also white church near the castle which is called St. Martin's
Parish Church, which will surprise you with its colourful style on the indoors. 

 My original plan was to visit Bled this autumn. However, I couldn't manage to
take the trip due to many factors. Fortunately, Mr. Sakura and I finally had
time to go at the end of this year. Therefore, we went for a trip to visit this
lovely town, and luckily had wonderful sunny weather. #斯洛維尼亞 #布萊德湖 #日記 #開動with貓 
#KaidongWithKat #Slovenia #LakeBled

在聖沃夫岡小鎮裡貓兒超愛這間『Kronprinz Rudolf und seine
Liebe』生活用品店(中文譯名：王儲魯道夫與他的摯愛)。這間店外面是淡淡薄荷綠的石牆，牆上裝飾著好多精巧的廚房用品，室內更是琳瑯滿目的小傢俱與廚房用具。不時會有打折，一進去後就被黏住了啦
😂實在是很好買！

 There's a lovely shop called "Kronprinz Rudolf und seine Liebe", in St.
Wolfgang. It has so many kitchenware! The outside of this old building was
painted in a light mint green colour, and it has many small cups and pots
decorating the wall. I didn't want to leave the shop, as it was just too
difficult for me to choose what I want to buy, since all of their kitchenware is
so pretty! #奧地利 #聖沃夫岡 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #KaidongWithKat #trip 
#StWolfgang

在奧地利朋友們的推薦下，貓兒今日很有緣分的拜訪了這間聖沃夫岡小鎮裡的『咖啡工作坊Kaffeewerkstatt』(中文音譯為：卡夫沃克斯塔咖啡工廠・公寓)
一樓是咖啡廳，樓上提供公寓出租。他們家的咖啡品質很好，許多奧地利當地朋友們都很喜歡，加上創新的室內設計，把古老的傢俱重新拼湊，呈現奧地利版的老屋新翻的風格！在前衛的用色與設計中看到許多舊傢俱，既衝突又協調。
.
重點是咖啡很棒，甚至有『奧地利熱豆漿』呢！雖然菜單裡沒有寫，不過可以跟服務生點，算是隱藏版的囉。這是貓兒第一次在咖啡廳裡喝到熱豆漿🐱經驗難得啊❤️！

 Some Austrian friends suggested a nice coffee house in St. Wolfgang to me,
which is called Kaffeewerkstatt (coffee workshop). This shop is very special, as
you can find lots of traditional Austrian furniture, but presented in a modern
interior style. The ground floor has a famous coffee shop, and the apartments
upstairs are available to book through various websites. 
.
Today I not only ordered a cup of cappuccino, but also Austrian-style hot soya
milk. It surprised me a lot I was able to order it, since it was not on the
menu. However, on such a cold winter day, hot soya milk is a good choice! Yummy! 
#奧地利 #聖沃夫岡 #卡夫沃克斯塔咖啡公寓 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Kaffeewerkstatt 
#KaidongWithKat #trip #StWolfgang

連續幾日天氣大晴🌞
Mr.櫻與貓兒到Ramsau藍紹Hintersee辛特湖散步。白晝暖、入夜冷，一眼間樹葉變色的很快！森林裡的空氣特別的清，湖水特別的靜，四周圍繞著五彩繽紛黃澄澄的葉片
🍂落葉被貓兒踩的沙沙發響。賞秋：寧靜而溫婉、天高而雲淡、恬靜而悠長。這個季節是收穫、是歸根、是逐漸準備孕育明年大地的新生命。

 Recently, the weather in Salzburg has been very nice. However, while it's sunny
during daytime, in the night it's getting cold. Therefore, the leaves are
changing their colours dramatically. This weekend Mr. Sakura and I visited
Hintersee in Ramsau, Germany. In the forest it was very quiet and calm, and we
enjoyed stepping on the falling leaves. Autumn season is not only the time for
harvest, it also feels very peaceful and harmonious. Withered leaves are falling
from the trees and join the surrounding soil, doing their part in forming new
life for the next year. #德國 #巴伐利亞州 #藍紹 #辛特湖 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany 
#Bayern #KaidongWithKat #trip #Ramsau #Hintersee

進入11月份後真的是冷了，昨日早上拉開窗簾往外看，赫然發現前方Gaisberg蓋斯伯格山頂已經白皚皚一整片🗻
薩爾斯堡平地飄雨，山區下起雪來...這就是11月的溫度啊！

 
這樣的天氣在家裡煮一大鍋熱粥慢慢吃是最開心不過的，想起貓爸最會煲的廣東皮蛋粥，讓我好回味...所幸翻翻家裡冷凍庫還有什麼食材，剛好可以煮一鍋『干貝鮮蝦＆皮蛋鹹蛋粥』加上在亞超巧遇的油條，這一切實在太完美了！就是入冬的味道啊
❤️開動囉。

 It's November now, and the weather is getting colder and colder. Yesterday
morning when we opened the curtains, we saw that the top of Gaisberg had some
snow.

 So Winter is already here, and now is the perfect time to eat something warm.
On cold days like this, Kat's father used to make classic Cantonese congee with
pork and century eggs, which is a dish that I really miss eating. 

 I found shrimps and scallops in the freezer, and used them to cook a delicious
hot congee with seafood, as well as salted and century eggs.This dish is very
comforting and makes you feel warm inside. It's perfect to serve with fried
bread sticks (you-tiao). Yummy! Kaidong! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #cooking

特勞恩湖畔除了Schloss Ort沃特城堡，還有一個很漂亮的小鎮名為『特勞恩教堂
Traunkirchen』他的地標是鎮裡山明水秀的半島。半島是由大岩石堆積成的陡坡，山坡上座落著迷你白色教堂。半島下方是可愛的木頭船屋與整片湛藍湖水...重點是餐廳裡的鮮魚
🐟好好吃唷❤️😉！

 Near Traunsee lake you can find the Traunkirche (Traunsee church). It's a small
white church located on a beautiful peninsula. Around the lake shore are many
lovely cottages for boat parking. However, my personal highlight of this lake
are the tasty fishes! Haha! Yummy! #奧地利 #特勞恩教堂 #特勞恩湖 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Traunsee #TraunseeKirche

這個禮拜貓兒又去拜訪Golling溝嶺小鎮，在翡翠綠的『Bluntausee伯倫陶湖』散心，此湖真是個百去不厭👍
近幾日陽光正艷，雖然溫度變低了但只要是晴天都很美。冷風吹得樹梢急遽變色，走在繽紛燦爛的森林裡心情格外的好！

 更開心的是在湖畔餐廳吃到鮮美的『香煎伯倫陶湖鱒魚』當地人引用湖水來養殖😋肉嫩皮脆又鮮甜，這是貓兒到目前在奧地利嚐到最可口的鱒魚❤️開動啦~本性不改就是愛吃魚
🐟！
.
This week I went to Bluntautal lake in Golling again. The lake was shining in
fantastic emerald green, which fitted perfectly with the colourful leaves of
autumn! Strolling through the Bluntautal forest was very joyful and enjoyable.

 Located near the lake is a traditional Austrian restaurant, which serves very
delicious Bluntautal trout, which made me happy. It's the best trout that I have
eaten since a long time! Yummy! Kaidong! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #伯倫陶湖 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Bluntauseen

三日前下的薄雪...太陽出來後融化了🌞但天氣一樣冷，溫度仍是低！貓兒就來準備今年入冬的第一鍋『海鮮火鍋』迅速暖胃🍲
在家裡吃火鍋不疾不徐，想加什麼料都隨心所欲，喜歡就好❤️❤️開動囉！

 The first snow from three days ago already melted, but the temperatures are
still low and it's very cold outside. Therefore I made the first hot pot of this
year! In winter hot pot is one of my favorite dishes. Eating it at home is very
convenient. Just prepare what you like and put it all into a soup pot. After
boiling, add some sauce of your choice, and that's it. Very simple, but
delicious! Kaidong! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #cooking

這陣子『貓兒小館』好久沒有開張！週末出門玩耍沒開火，週間Mr.櫻超體貼先下廚把晚餐煮好，仔細算來我真的是有一陣子沒有烹飪。

 今日下班後跟朋友約好去森林(剛好在我們家附近)採香菇，秋天是菌類正盛季節，趁它還鮮嫩趕快摘回家料理😋
今晚櫻貓家的餐桌風景是當季的『野菇栗子炊飯』好好吃唷，加上 小飛的任性食堂 Phaedra小飛親自做的台式青醬非常銷魂，唇齒留香❤️開動囉🐱！

 I haven't cooked for a while! Recently, Mr. Sakura has been preparing our
dinner most of the time, and on weekend we weren't at home. Therefore, I rarely
cook at the moment.

 However, this evening after work my good friend and I went to the forest to
pick up fresh mushrooms. I never know there were so many mushrooms in this
forst, which is very close to our home! So for dinner I made mix of mushrooms
with chestnuts and rice. Together with this dish I tried the homemade
Asian-style pesto sauce from Phaedra. It smelled so good and was very tasty!
Yummy! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat 
#cooking

藍天 · 枯枝 · 冷空氣，這是冬季裡最好的寫照！薩爾斯堡市中心往北行，在郊外Anthering安特嶺小鎮的林子...平時是用來放養「野豬🐗
」的森林，這個區域有大大小小的沼澤地和木製守獵瞭望台。運氣好的時候在林間能看到松鼠🐿️跟野鹿🦌現在已經過了守獵季，整片森林與沼澤地又變成散步的好地方呢❤️！

 Clear blue sky, bare branches without leaves and crisp cold air - this
combination makes you feel the winter! Located on the north side of Salzburg is
Anthering. It's a small village with a big forest, that is used for breeding
wild boar. In this area, there are many swamps, lakes, and trees! When there's
nice weather, you not only can spot boar, but also wild deer, and even
squirrels. Now, since it's the off season for hunting, local people like to walk
in the forest and enjoy the fresh air. #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #安特嶺 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 
#Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Anthering

秋季美到最濃時，落葉在風裡紛飛🍂藍紹教堂在這個季節的風采亮麗的難以言喻啊！馬上就是11月1日了，此日是歐洲天主教的『諸聖節All Saints' Day -
掃墓日』這個宗教節日在奧地利全國放假回鄉掃墓。
.
西方人也是有“清明節”只是季節不同⛪️
亞洲文化的掃墓日在細雨紛飛的4月份，歐美則是在秋雨濛濛的11月初。飲水思源，弔念祖先都是人之本性！歐洲在教堂四周通常都有墓園，有的墓園甚至建造在教堂地底下，教堂與墓園呈現出寧靜與祥和，願祖先的靈魂在追思中恬靜安詳。PS:不過也蠻多歐洲人為了避開掃墓人潮，提前幾日先去墓園追思，例如櫻爸媽(公公婆婆)他們早在上禮拜已經把墓掃完。至於宗教信仰不同...沒有掃墓搶頭香這種問題啦
😂！思念祖先重在感謝❤️心誠。

 The best time in fall has arrived. Leaves have changed their colour and started
falling. It's deep autumn now. Soon will be Allerheiligen (All Saints' Day) in
Austria, which is on Friday, November 1st. 

 This religious festival is about commemorating all the saints, known and
unknown, as well as deceased relatives. In Asia the occasion for visiting
ancestral graves is the "Qingming Festival" in April. No matter if in Austria or
Taiwan, remembering the ancestors is very important, and therefore it's a
national holiday here! #德國 #巴伐利亞州 #藍紹 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Germany #Bayern 
#KaidongWithKat #trip #Ramsau

薩爾斯堡老城往南行，在阿爾卑斯山群中的滕嫩山脈裡(Tennengebirge)有許多山洞、峽谷，地勢陡峭！藏在山脈中地形特殊的嵐瑪峽谷Lammerklamm是我們很愛散步的地方，更是個美麗的秘境。

 
特別是峽谷中獨特的地形與渾然天成『土耳其藍turquoise』獨一無二介乎藍綠雙色之間的淙淙溪水！這一帶的湖水、河水幾乎都是如此。秋季峽谷森林的樹葉色澤豐富，更襯托了峽谷山澗裡匯流的河水，完全是讓人的難忘之美啊！

 Located in the Northern alps near Salzburg countryside, Tennengebirge (Tennen
mountain chain) has many caves and gorges. Lammerklamm is one of our favorite
gorges. In the middle of the steep cliffs, the river is flowing through it very
fast. Its water colour is close to turquoise.

 In this beautiful autumn season, the beautiful leaves together with the
uniquely blue-ish green river colour is so wonderful. We really enjoyed walking
along the wooden steps, experiencing beautiful natural sceneries. #奧地利 #阿爾卑斯山 
#滕嫩山脈 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #trip #Lammerklamm 
 #ScheffauAmTennengebirge

薩爾斯堡下2019年入冬的初雪囉❄️不過一日半後🌞太陽出來市區又瞬間融雪啦！...這幾日讓貓兒最感動的是...我種在室內野薑花竟然在11月開花呢，完全出乎意料
🤗室外0-10度，室內暖氣讓野薑花在入冬後仍含苞待放❤️香氣四溢！高興啊～

 Recently, the first snow in this winter fell in Salzburg city. However, after
the sun was rising, snow melted very fast. However, it's getting really cold
now, so please take care and keep yourselves warm.

 I'm very surprised that my butterfly lilies started flowering! It must be the
warmth of the house heater that helps the flowers blooming! I'm so happy that
this November we still can see beautiful fresh butterfly lilies again! #奧地利 
#薩爾斯堡 #小苑日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg #KaidongWithKat #Gardening

要在歐洲買到好吃的家鄉味可遇不可求啊...還是自己下廚比較快！天氣變冷後喝熱湯真是種享受❤️
牛肉麵更是秋季暖胃的好夥伴哩！Mr.櫻跟貓兒很有默契的開始想念起牛肉麵的美味。下廚前Mr.櫻還特別叮囑我『亞洲酸菜家裡還有嗎？』貓兒忍不住大笑說：天阿...你這個厭惡德奧酸菜的奧地利人，卻這麼熱愛台式酸菜，家裡當然還有庫存
😉熱呼呼的牛肉麵跟酸菜是絕配，搭起來是💯分的台灣味🐱開動囉！

 It's getting colder, so a warm soup is the best choice for this season.
Therefore, I made a pot of hot beef noodle soup. It's the favourite Taiwanese
noodle dish of Mr. Sakura and I. The most suitable side dish of the beef noodle
soup is pickled green mustard. We like it so much, it's 100% Taiwanese-style
flavor! Yummy, Kaidong! #奧地利 #薩爾斯堡 #餐桌日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria #Salzburg 
#KaidongWithKat #cooking

嘿嘿嘿！在亞洲超市找到寶呢，竟然巧遇『菱角』好難得啊，這次可是頭一回在歐洲看到新鮮菱角🤩順便又買了一包切片冷凍的蓮藕煮成『菱角蓮藕蔬菜湯』配上剛做好的手工包子

 I was so surprised to find water chestnuts at the local Asia shop this autumn.
Therefore, I used them, as well as lotus roots and vegetables, to cook a soup.
This hot soup, together with homemade steamed meat buns were a perfect match. I

 Mondsee town is located in Upper Austria, and it is most famous for its
beautiful moon shape lake with the same name. The famous marriage scene of the
"Sound of Music" movie was filmed in the St. Michael church in Mondsee,
therefore many people from around the world come to visit this town.

 Mr. Sakura and I recently came here to have a stroll around the lake and the
Christmas market, which is located right in front of the St. Michael church.
Today is the 4th advent Sunday and it's also the winter solstice. I prepared
some red beans paste stuffed sticky rice dumplings with matcha for this special
day. Wish you all a nice Sunday! #奧地利 #上奧地利州 #月亮湖 #旅遊日記 #生活日記 #開動with貓 #Austria

 Frankfurt's Christmas market is located at Römerberg square, which is in the
centre of the city. Around the unique German traditional "Fachwerkhaus" (a style
of timber framing house) buildings many lovely little X-Mas street vendors are
selling their goods. Therefore, the entire square is very crowded! Not only
local people, but also many tourists from all over the world like to visit
there. Let's have a cup of hot mulled wine to experience the Christmas
